  <title>Privacy Policy - Properties 4 Creations</title>
  <link rel='manifest' href='/manifest.json' />
  
  <meta name='msapplication-TileColor' content='#0B1120' />
  <meta name='description'
    content='Properties 4 Creations privacy policy for veteran housing applications and services in East Texas.' />
</head>

<body>
  <!-- Skip Link -->
  <a href='#main' class='skip-link'>Skip to main content</a>

  <!-- HEADER -->
  <header class='header-glass'>
    <nav class='navbar'>
      <div class='nav-container'>
        <div class='nav-brand'>
          <h1>Properties 4 Creations</h1>
        </div>
        <button class='menu-toggle' aria-label='Toggle navigation menu'>
          <i data-lucide='menu'></i>
          <i data-lucide='x'></i>
        </button>
        <ul class='nav-menu' id='nav-menu'>
          <li><a href='index.html' class='nav-link'>Home</a></li>
          <li><a href='properties.html' class='nav-link'>Properties</a></li>
          <li><a href='resources.html' class='nav-link'>Resources</a></li>
          <li>
            <a href='transparency.html' class='nav-link'>Transparency</a>
          </li>
          <li><a href='impact.html' class='nav-link'>Impact</a></li>
          <li><a href='apply.html' class='nav-link'>Apply Now</a></li>
          <li><a href='contact.html' class='nav-link'>Contact</a></li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </nav>
  </header>

  <main id='main'>
    <!-- PAGE HEADER -->
    <section class='page-banner' style="
          background-image: url(&quot;/images/banners/hero-privacy-banner.webp&quot;);
          background-size: cover;
          background-position: center;
        ">
      <div class='container'>
        <h1>Privacy Policy</h1>
        <p>How we protect and use your personal information</p>
      </div>
    </section>

    <!-- PRIVACY CONTENT -->
    <section class='privacy-container container'>
      <div class='resources-header'>
        <p class='last-updated'>
          <strong>Last Updated: December 14, 2025</strong>
        </p>
      </div>

      <div class='privacy-content'>
        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Overview</h2>
          <p>
            Properties 4 Creations ('we,' 'our,' or 'us') is committed to
            protecting the privacy and security of your personal information.
            This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and
            safeguard your information when you use our website, apply for
            housing, or interact with our services.
          </p>
          <p>
            We are a veteran-owned housing provider specializing in premium,
            renovated homes for veterans and families in East Texas. We comply
            with all applicable privacy laws and regulations, including the
            Fair Housing Act and Texas privacy laws.
          </p>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Information We Collect</h2>

          <h3>Personal Information</h3>
          <p>We may collect the following types of personal information:</p>
          <ul>
            <li>
              <strong>Contact Information:</strong> Name, phone number, email
              address, mailing address
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Demographic Information:</strong> Date of birth,
              household size, income information
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Housing Information:</strong> Housing assistance program
              participation, voucher details
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Military Service Information:</strong> Branch of
              service, discharge status (for veteran applicants)
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Housing Preferences:</strong> Preferred property types,
              accessibility needs, move-in timeline
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Communication Records:</strong> Messages, questions, and
              feedback you send to us
            </li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Automatically Collected Information</h3>
          <p>When you visit our website, we may automatically collect:</p>
          <ul>
            <li>
              <strong>Usage Data:</strong> Pages visited, time spent on pages,
              click patterns
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Technical Data:</strong> IP address, browser type,
              operating system, device type
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Analytics:</strong> Google Analytics data for website
              improvement
            </li>
          </ul>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>How We Use Your Information</h2>
          <p>We use collected information for the following purposes:</p>

          <h3>Housing Services</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Process housing applications and determine eligibility</li>
            <li>
              Verify income and voucher information with housing authorities
            </li>
            <li>Match applicants with suitable properties</li>
            <li>Manage lease agreements and property assignments</li>
            <li>Coordinate move-in processes and property showings</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Communication</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Respond to inquiries and provide customer support</li>
            <li>Send important updates about applications and properties</li>
            <li>Provide information about housing programs and resources</li>
            <li>Share transparency reports and property information</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Legal Compliance</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>
              Comply with Fair Housing laws and anti-discrimination
              requirements
            </li>
            <li>Meet reporting requirements for housing programs</li>
            <li>
              Maintain accurate records for landlord-tenant relationships
            </li>
            <li>Protect against fraud and ensure tenant safety</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Website Improvement</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Analyze website usage to improve user experience</li>
            <li>Debug technical issues and ensure site functionality</li>
            <li>Personalize content based on housing interests</li>
          </ul>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Information Sharing and Disclosure</h2>
          <p>
            We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third
            parties. We may share information only in the following
            circumstances:
          </p>

          <h3>Housing Program Verification</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>
              <strong>HUD and VA:</strong> Verify voucher status and
              eligibility with HUD-VASH coordinators or VA representatives
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Public Housing Authorities:</strong> Confirm Section 8
              voucher validity and compliance
            </li>
            <li>
              <strong>Background Check Providers:</strong> Conduct tenant
              screening for safety and compliance
            </li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Legal Requirements</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Respond to subpoenas, court orders, or legal requirements</li>
            <li>
              Report suspected fraud, criminal activity, or safety threats
            </li>
            <li>
              Comply with government housing program audits and reporting
            </li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Service Providers</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>
              Property management software providers (with data protection
              agreements)
            </li>
            <li>
              Professional services (legal, accounting) under confidentiality
              agreements
            </li>
            <li>Website hosting and maintenance providers</li>
          </ul>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Data Security</h2>
          <p>
            We implement appropriate technical, administrative, and physical
            security measures to protect your personal information:
          </p>

          <h3>Technical Protections</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>SSL/TLS encryption for data transmission</li>
            <li>Secure data storage with access controls</li>
            <li>Regular security audits and updates</li>
            <li>Multi-factor authentication for staff access</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Administrative Protections</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>
              Limited access to personal information on need-to-know basis
            </li>
            <li>Staff training on privacy and security procedures</li>
            <li>Regular security awareness programs</li>
            <li>Incident response and breach notification procedures</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Physical Protections</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Secure office facilities with access controls</li>
            <li>Document storage in locked cabinets</li>
            <li>Secure disposal of physical records</li>
          </ul>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Your Rights and Choices</h2>

          <h3>Access and Correction</h3>
          <p>You have the right to:</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Request access to your personal information we maintain</li>
            <li>
              Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete information
            </li>
            <li>Receive a copy of your information in a portable format</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Communication Preferences</h3>
          <p>You may:</p>
          <ul>
            <li>
              Opt out of marketing communications (though we rarely send
              these)
            </li>
            <li>
              Choose how you wish to be contacted for application updates
            </li>
            <li>Update your contact information at any time</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Data Deletion</h3>
          <p>
            You can request deletion of your information, though we may retain
            certain information as required by law or for legitimate business
            purposes, such as:
          </p>
          <ul>
            <li>Completed lease records (for legal compliance)</li>
            <li>Financial records (for tax and accounting purposes)</li>
            <li>Communications about safety or legal matters</li>
          </ul>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Cookies and Tracking</h2>
          <p>Our website uses cookies and similar technologies:</p>

          <h3>Essential Cookies</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Remember your session and security preferences</li>
            <li>Enable website functionality and navigation</li>
            <li>Process applications and forms</li>
          </ul>

          <h3>Analytics Cookies</h3>
          <ul>
            <li>Google Analytics to understand website usage</li>
            <li>Help improve user experience</li>
            <li>Identify technical issues</li>
          </ul>

          <p>
            You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings,
            though disabling essential cookies may affect website
            functionality.
          </p>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Children's Privacy</h2>
          <p>
            Our services are intended for adults 18 years and older. We do not
            knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If
            we become aware that we have collected information from a child,
            we will delete it immediately.
          </p>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Changes to This Policy</h2>
          <p>
            We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes
            in our practices or applicable laws. We will:
          </p>
          <ul>
            <li>Post the updated policy on our website</li>
            <li>Update the 'Last Updated' date above</li>
            <li>
              Notify you of significant changes via email or website notice
            </li>
            <li>Continue to respect the privacy choices you've made</li>
          </ul>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Contact Us About Privacy</h2>
          <p>
            If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our data
            practices, please contact us:
          </p>

          <div class='contact-methods'>
            <p>
              <strong>Properties 4 Creations</strong><br />
              Privacy Officer<br />
              Tyler, Texas
            </p>

            <p>
              <strong>Email:</strong> privacy@properties4creations.com<br />
              <strong>Phone:</strong> (903) 555-1234
            </p>
          </div>

          <p>
            Response Time: We respond to privacy inquiries within 48 hours.
          </p>
        </div>

        <div class='privacy-section'>
          <h2>Complaints and Dispute Resolution</h2>
          <p>If you believe your privacy rights have been violated:</p>
          <ul>
            <li>Contact us directly first for resolution</li>
            <li>File a complaint with the Texas Attorney General's Office</li>
            <li>
              Report housing discrimination to HUD (fairhousing@HUD.gov)
            </li>
            <li>Contact appropriate state or federal regulatory agencies</li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </div>
    </section>
  </main>

          <p>Veterans Crisis Line: <a href='tel:988' class='emergency-link'>988</a> |
            Housing Crisis: <a href='tel:1-800-827-1000' class='emergency-link'>1-800-827-1000</a></p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

  <script src='https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js'
    integrity='sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB'
    crossorigin='anonymous'></script>
  <script>
    lucide.createIcons();
  </script>
  <script src='/js/accessibility-enhanced.js'></script>
  <script src='/js/main.js'></script>
  <script>
    // Video loading optimization and fallback handling
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
      const video = document.querySelector('.hero-video');
      const fallback = document.querySelector('.video-fallback');
      
      if (video) {
        // Hide fallback when video loads
        video.addEventListener('loadeddata', function() {
          fallback.style.display = 'none';
        });
        
        // Show fallback if video fails to load
        video.addEventListener('error', function() {
          fallback.style.display = 'block';
        });
        
        // Handle video visibility for performance
        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
          entries.forEach(entry => {
            if (entry.isIntersecting) {
              video.play().catch(e => {
                console.warn('Video autoplay failed:', e);
                fallback.style.display = 'block';
              });
            } else {
              video.pause();
            }
          });
        });
        
        observer.observe(video);
      }
    });
  </script>
</body>

</html>

        content='Learn about housing programs and requirements to help you find your home. Information on HUD-VASH, Section 8, VA loans, and more.' />
</head>

    <!-- Skip Link -->
    <a href='#main-content' class='skip-link'>Skip to main content</a>

    <header class="header-glass" role="banner">
  <div class="skip-to-content">
    <a href="#main-content" class="skip-link">Skip to main content</a>
  </div>

        <span class="brand-text">Properties 4 Creations</span>
      </a>
    </div>

    </button>

      <ul class="nav-menu" role="menubar">
        <li role="none">
          <a href="/" class="nav-link" role="menuitem" aria-current="page">Home</a>

          <a href="/about/" class="nav-link" role="menuitem">About</a>
        </li>
        <li role="none">
          <a href="/impact/" class="nav-link" role="menuitem">Our Impact</a>
        </li>
        <li role="none">
          <a href="/resources/" class="nav-link" role="menuitem">Resources</a>
        </li>
        <li role="none">
          <a href="/contact/" class="nav-link" role="menuitem">Contact</a>
        </li>
        <li role="none" class="nav-cta">
          <a href="/apply/" class="btn btn-primary cta-link" role="menuitem">Apply Now</a>
        </li>

    <main id='main-content'>
        <!-- RESOURCES HEADER -->
        <section class='resources-header' style="
          background-image: url(&quot;/images/banners/hero-about-us-banner.webp&quot;);
          background-size: cover;
          background-position: center;
        ">
            <div class='container'>
                <h1>Housing Resources</h1>
                <p>
                    Learn about programs and requirements to help you find your home.
                </p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- PROGRAM CARDS -->
        <section class='resources-container'>
            <div class='program-card'>
                <h3>
                    <i data-lucide='shield'></i> HUD-VASH (Veterans Affairs Supportive
                    Housing)
                </h3>
                <p>
                    A collaborative program between the VA and HUD providing rental
                    assistance and supportive services to homeless veterans and their
                    families.
                </p>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Eligibility:</strong> Must be a veteran with a housing
                        crisis due to homelessness or at-risk homelessness
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Income Requirement:</strong> Income at or below 50% of
                        Area Median Income (AMI)
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Our Role:</strong> We accept HUD-VASH vouchers and provide
                        quality housing without discrimination
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Process:</strong> Veterans are referred by the VA after
                        receiving a voucher
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class='program-card'>
                <h3><i data-lucide='home'></i> Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h3>
                <p>
                    The most common rental assistance program for very low-income
                    families, elderly, and disabled persons.
                </p>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Eligibility:</strong> Income at or below 50% of Area
                        Median Income (AMI)
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>East Texas Example:</strong> For a single person in
                        Longview/Tyler, max income ≈ $19,750/year
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Our Acceptance:</strong> 100% Section 8 acceptance - we
                        welcome voucher holders
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Timeline:</strong> Waitlists vary by housing authority;
                        some are currently closed
                    </li>
                </ul>

                <div class='eligibility-checklist'>
                    <h4>Section 8 Eligibility Checklist:</h4>
                    <div class='checklist-item'>
                        <div class='checkbox'></div>
                        <label>Income at or below 50% of Area Median Income</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class='checklist-item'>
                        <div class='checkbox'></div>
                        <label>U.S. Citizen or eligible immigrant</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class='checklist-item'>
                        <div class='checkbox'></div>
                        <label>Valid Social Security number</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class='checklist-item'>
                        <div class='checkbox'></div>
                        <label>No recent evictions for cause (typically last 3 years)</label>
                    </div>
                    <div class='checklist-item'>
                        <div class='checkbox'></div>
                        <label>No drug-related criminal history (varies by authority)</label>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class='program-card'>
                <h3><i data-lucide='dollar-sign'></i> VA Home Loans</h3>
                <p>
                    A zero-down-payment mortgage program exclusively for eligible
                    veterans, active duty service members, and surviving spouses.
                </p>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Benefits:</strong> No down payment required, no PMI,
                        competitive interest rates
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Texas VA Loans:</strong> Up to $806,000 or more depending
                        on county
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Eligibility:</strong> Honorable discharge, active duty 90+
                        days (or reserves/guard 6+ years)
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Our Support:</strong> We provide financing resources and
                        can guide veteran homebuyers
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>

            <div class='program-card'>
                <h3>
                    <i data-lucide='users'></i> SSVF (Supportive Services for Veteran
                    Families)
                </h3>
                <p>
                    Case management and financial assistance for veterans and families
                    at risk of homelessness or experiencing homelessness.
                </p>
                <ul>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Services:</strong> Emergency financial assistance, rental
                        assistance, case management
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Coverage:</strong> Available through VA partners in East
                        Texas
                    </li>
                    <li>
                        <strong>Access:</strong> Contact your local VA office for
                        eligibility and enrollment
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <main id='main'>
        <!-- PAGE HEADER -->
        <section class='page-banner page-banner-terms'>
            <div class='container'>
                <h1>Terms of Service</h1>
                <p>Agreement for using our housing services and website</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- TERMS CONTENT -->
        <section class='terms-container container'>
            <div class='resources-header'>
                <p class='last-updated'>
                    <strong>Last Updated: December 14, 2025</strong>
                </p>
            </div>

            <div class='terms-content'>
                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Acceptance of Terms</h2>
                    <p>
                        By accessing and using this website operated by Properties 4
                        Creations ('the Company,' 'we,' 'us,' or 'our'), you accept and
                        agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
                        These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or
                        use the service.
                    </p>
                    <p>
                        If you do not agree to these terms, you may not access or use this
                        website or our services. We are a veteran-owned business
                        specializing in premium, renovated housing for veterans and
                        families in East Texas.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Housing Services Agreement</h2>

                    <h3>Application Process</h3>
                    <p>When you submit an application for housing:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>All information provided must be truthful and accurate</li>
                        <li>We reserve the right to verify all information submitted</li>
                        <li>
                            Applications are reviewed in order of completion and suitability
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            We may request additional documentation to verify eligibility
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Meeting application requirements does not guarantee housing
                            placement
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Eligibility Requirements</h3>
                    <p>To be eligible for our housing services, you must:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Hold a valid housing voucher (Section 8, HUD-VASH, etc.)</li>
                        <li>
                            Meet income requirements as specified by your housing program
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Pass background checks conducted by licensed screening companies
                        </li>
                        <li>Provide required documentation and certifications</li>
                        <li>Comply with all Fair Housing and program regulations</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Lease Agreements</h3>
                    <p>Successful applicants will be required to:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Sign a residential lease agreement</li>
                        <li>Pay security deposits as required by state law</li>
                        <li>Maintain the property in good condition</li>
                        <li>Comply with all lease terms and conditions</li>
                        <li>Continue to meet program eligibility requirements</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Website Use Terms</h2>

                    <h3>Permitted Use</h3>
                    <p>You may use our website for:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Browsing available properties and services</li>
                        <li>Submitting housing applications</li>
                        <li>Accessing information about housing programs</li>
                        <li>Communicating with our team</li>
                        <li>
                            Learning about our renovation standards and quality guarantees
                        </li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Prohibited Activities</h3>
                    <p>You may not:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Submit false or fraudulent information</li>
                        <li>Use the website for any unlawful purpose</li>
                        <li>Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems</li>
                        <li>Interfere with the proper functioning of the website</li>
                        <li>Use automated systems to scrape or download content</li>
                        <li>Impersonate any person or entity</li>
                        <li>Distribute spam or unsolicited communications</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h3>Content and Intellectual Property</h3>
                    <p>
                        All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and
                        design elements:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            Is the property of Properties 4 Creations or our licensors
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            May not be reproduced, distributed, or modified without
                            permission
                        </li>
                        <li>May be used only for legitimate business purposes</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Privacy and Data Protection</h2>
                    <p>
                        Your privacy is important to us. Our collection and use of
                        personal information is governed by our Privacy Policy, which is
                        incorporated into these terms by reference. By using our services,
                        you consent to our data practices as outlined in our Privacy
                        Policy.
                    </p>

                    <h3>Information Security</h3>
                    <p>
                        We implement reasonable security measures to protect your
                        information, but:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            No method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure
                        </li>
                        <li>We cannot guarantee absolute security of your information</li>
                        <li>
                            You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your
                            account credentials
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            You should report any suspected security breaches immediately
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Fair Housing Compliance</h2>
                    <p>
                        Properties 4 Creations is committed to Fair Housing principles:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            We do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, sex,
                            national origin, familial status, or disability
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            We provide reasonable accommodations for applicants with
                            disabilities
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            All housing decisions are based on program eligibility and
                            property suitability
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            We comply with all federal, state, and local fair housing laws
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Discrimination complaints may be reported to HUD and state
                            agencies
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Disclaimer of Warranties</h2>
                    <p>
                        Our website and services are provided 'as is' and 'as available.'
                        We disclaim all warranties, including but not limited to:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            Implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a
                            particular purpose
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Warranties that the website will be error-free or uninterrupted
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Warranties regarding the accuracy or reliability of content
                        </li>
                        <li>Warranties that defects will be corrected</li>
                    </ul>
                    <p>
                        We do not warrant that our website will meet your specific
                        requirements or that any errors will be corrected.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Limitation of Liability</h2>
                    <p>
                        To the fullest extent permitted by law, Properties 4 Creations
                        shall not be liable for:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            Any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive
                            damages
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Damages resulting from unauthorized access to your information
                        </li>
                        <li>Any other matter related to our services or website</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Property Information and Representations</h2>
                    <p>While we strive to provide accurate property information:</p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            Property availability and features may change without notice
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Images and descriptions are for informational purposes only
                        </li>
                        <li>Actual properties may differ from marketing materials</li>
                        <li>
                            We recommend visiting properties in person before making
                            decisions
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Renovation standards and warranties are as specified in
                            individual lease agreements
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Governing Law and Dispute Resolution</h2>
                    <p>
                        These terms are governed by the laws of the State of Texas. Any
                        disputes arising from:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>
                            Housing applications or tenancy will be resolved in Texas courts
                        </li>
                        <li>Website use may be subject to binding arbitration</li>
                        <li>
                            Fair housing complaints may be filed with appropriate agencies
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            We encourage direct communication to resolve disputes when
                            possible
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Changes to Terms</h2>
                    <p>
                        We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes
                        will be:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Posted on this page with an updated 'Last Updated' date</li>
                        <li>Effective immediately upon posting for website use</li>
                        <li>
                            Communicated to active applicants via email for service-related
                            changes
                        </li>
                        <li>
                            Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of modified
                            terms
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='terms-section'>
                    <h2>Severability</h2>
                    <p>
                        If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable or
                        invalid, the remaining provisions will continue to be valid and
                        enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by law.

  <script src='https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js'
    integrity='sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB'
    crossorigin='anonymous'></script>

  <script src='/js/main.js'></script>

  <script>
    // THANK YOU PAGE ENHANCEMENTS
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      // Animate success icon
      const successIcon = document.querySelector('.success-icon i');
      if (successIcon) {
        successIcon.style.animation = 'pulse 2s ease-in-out 3';
      }

      // Add pulse animation
      const style = document.createElement('style');
      style.textContent = `
                @keyframes pulse {
                    0% { transform: scale(1); }
                    50% { transform: scale(1.1); }
                    100% { transform: scale(1); }
                }
            `;
      document.head.appendChild(style);

      // Track application submission (if analytics is set up)
      if (window.gtag) {
        gtag('event', 'application_submitted', {
          event_category: 'application',
          event_label: 'housing_application',
        });
      }
    });
  </script>
</body>

<html lang='en'>

        content='Our renovation standards and quality commitments for veteran housing. See exactly what you get with Properties 4 Creations.' />

    <!-- Skip Link -->

        <!-- RENOVATION STANDARDS -->
        <section class='transparency-container container'>
            <div class='resources-header'>
                <h1>Premium Renovation Standards</h1>
                <p>
                    Every home we offer meets our rigorous renovation standards. We
                    believe in complete transparency, which is why we're sharing exactly
                    what you get.
                </p>
            </div>

            <div class='quality-standards'>
                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='fan'></i> HVAC System</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Certified installation by licensed technicians</li>
                        <li>Full system inspection and testing</li>
                        <li>New thermostats with programmable features</li>
                        <li>12-month warranty on all parts and labor</li>
                        <li>Annual maintenance recommended</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='home'></i> Roof System</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Complete tear-off and replacement (not just repair)</li>
                        <li>Premium architectural shingles</li>
                        <li>New flashing and vent installations</li>
                        <li>Gutters and downspouts included</li>
                        <li>10-year manufacturer warranty</li>
                        <li>Licensed roofing contractors only</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='settings'></i> Plumbing System</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Copper pipes throughout the property</li>
                        <li>New fixtures and faucets</li>
                        <li>Updated water heater with warranty</li>
                        <li>Full system pressure testing</li>
                        <li>No leaks or drips guaranteed</li>
                        <li>Professional plumbing inspections</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='zap'></i> Electrical System</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Modern electrical panel upgrade</li>
                        <li>GFCI outlets in all required areas</li>
                        <li>New interior and exterior switches</li>
                        <li>Updated lighting fixtures</li>
                        <li>Electrical inspection certificate</li>
                        <li>Complies with all building codes</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='door'></i> Windows & Doors</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>All exterior doors replaced if needed</li>
                        <li>Updated interior doors (smooth operation)</li>
                        <li>New locks and hardware included</li>
                        <li>Weatherstripping applied throughout</li>
                        <li>Warranty on all door hardware</li>
                        <li>Ensure no drafts or gaps</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='brush'></i> Interior Finishes</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Professional painting throughout</li>
                        <li>New appliances installed and tested</li>
                        <li>Cleaned and sanitized before occupancy</li>
                        <li>All carpet cleaned or replaced</li>
                        <li>Lights and switches replaced</li>
                        <li>Ceiling fans in appropriate rooms</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='shield-check'></i> Safety Standards</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Smoke detectors in every bedroom</li>
                        <li>Carbon monoxide detector installed</li>
                        <li>Fire extinguishers provided</li>
                        <li>All safety equipment inspected</li>
                        <li>Emergency exit routes clear</li>
                        <li>Access to emergency services</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <div class='standard-card'>
                    <h3><i data-lucide='accessibility'></i> Accessibility Features</h3>
                    <ul class='checklist'>
                        <li>Ramps and accessibility modifications available</li>
                        <li>Low-threshold entries where requested</li>
                        <li>Wide doorways in common areas</li>
                        <li>Accessible bathroom features</li>
                        <li>Accommodations for disabilities considered</li>
                        <li>Fair Housing accessibility compliance</li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- QUALITY GUARANTEE -->
        <section class='trust-section'>
            <div class='container'>
                <h2>Quality Guarantee</h2>
                <p>
                    We stand behind our work. Every renovation includes comprehensive
                    warranties and quality assurances.
                </p>

                <div class='warranty-grid'>
                    <div class='warranty-card'>
                        <h3>Structural Warranty</h3>
                        <p>
                            Foundation, framing, and structural components are warranted for
                            defects in materials and workmanship for up to 5 years.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <div class='warranty-card'>
                        <h3>Systems Warranty</h3>
                        <p>
                            HVAC, plumbing, and electrical systems carry 12-month warranties
                            on both parts and labor.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <div class='warranty-card'>
                        <h3>Cosmetic Warranty</h3>
                        <p>
                            Paint, flooring, and cosmetic improvements are warranted for 6
                            months against defects.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- PROCESS TRANSPARENCY -->
        <section class='impact-snapshot'>
            <div class='container'>
                <h2>Our Renovation Process</h2>
                <p>
                    We believe in complete transparency in how we work. Here's exactly
                    how we transform properties for our veterans and families.
                </p>

                <div class='process-timeline'>
                    <div class='timeline-item'>
                        <div class='timeline-number'>1</div>
                        <h3>Property Acquisition</h3>
                        <p>
                            Properties are carefully selected based on location, condition,
                            and potential for veteran housing.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <div class='timeline-item'>
                        <div class='timeline-number'>2</div>
                        <h3>Assessment & Planning</h3>
                        <p>
                            Professional inspectors assess current condition and create
                            detailed renovation plans with cost estimates.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <div class='timeline-item'>
                        <div class='timeline-number'>3</div>
                        <h3>Licensed Contractors</h3>
                        <p>
                            All work is performed by licensed, insured contractors
                            experienced in residential renovations.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <div class='timeline-item'>
                        <div class='timeline-number'>4</div>
                        <h3>Quality Inspections</h3>
                        <p>
                            Independent inspections at multiple stages ensure work meets our
                            standards and local building codes.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                    <div class='timeline-item'>
                        <div class='timeline-number'>5</div>
                        <h3>Final Certification</h3>
                        <p>
                            Properties receive final inspections and certificates before
                            being made available to applicants.
                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

                    <div class='cost-breakdown-details'>
                        <h3>Typical Renovation Budget Allocation</h3>
                        <ul>
                            <li>
                                <strong>HVAC System:</strong> $8,000 - $12,000 (includes full
                                system replacement)
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Roofing:</strong> $5,000 - $8,000 (complete tear-off
                                and replacement)
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Plumbing:</strong> $4,000 - $7,000 (copper pipes,
                                fixtures, water heater)
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Electrical:</strong> $3,000 - $5,000 (panel upgrade,
                                new wiring, fixtures)
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Interior Finishes:</strong> $3,000 - $6,000 (paint,
                                flooring, appliances)
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Structural & Safety:</strong> $2,000 - $4,000
                                (inspections, safety features)
                            </li>
                            <li>
                                <strong>Permits & Inspections:</strong> $500 - $1,000
                                (required by law)
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

    // Initialize property map
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
      if (document.getElementById('property-map')) {
        const map = L.map('property-map').setView([32.351, -95.301], 15);
        L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
          attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors',
        }).addTo(map);

        // Add property marker
        L.marker([32.351, -95.301])
          .addTo(map)
          .bindPopup('<b>Tyler Ranch Home</b><br>3BR, 2BA - Section 8 Ready')
          .openPopup();
      }
    });

    <script>
        // 404 PAGE ENHANCEMENTS
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            // Add hover effects to link cards
            const linkCards = document.querySelectorAll('.link-card');
            linkCards.forEach(card => {
                card.addEventListener('mouseenter', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(-5px)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 8px 20px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.15)';
                });
                
                card.addEventListener('mouseleave', function() {
                    this.style.transform = 'translateY(0)';
                    this.style.boxShadow = '0 2px 8px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.1)';
                });
            });

            // Track 404 errors (if analytics is set up)
            if (window.gtag) {
                gtag('event', 'page_not_found', {
                    page_location: window.location.href,
                    page_referrer: document.referrer
                });
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

      "description": "Support for child abuse prevention and intervention"
    }
  ]
}

        <!-- MISSION SECTION -->
        <section class="mission-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="mission-content">
                    <div class="mission-text">
                        <h2>Our Mission</h2>
                        <p>Properties 4 Creations exists to honor the service of veterans and families by providing premium, renovated housing that serves as the foundation for rebuilding lives and strengthening communities across East Texas.</p>
                        
                        <p>Founded and operated by veterans, we understand the unique challenges our fellow service members face when transitioning to civilian life. Stable, quality housing isn't just a need—it's a stepping stone to success.</p>
                        
                        <div class="mission-values">
                            <div class="value-card">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="shield"></i> Honor</h3>
                                <p>We honor the service of veterans and their families through our commitment to excellence.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="value-card">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="heart"></i> Compassion</h3>
                                <p>We approach every family with dignity, respect, and understanding.</p>
                            </div>
                            <div class="value-card">
                                <h3><i data-lucide="award"></i> Excellence</h3>
                                <p>We set the highest standards for renovation quality and service delivery.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- STORY SECTION -->
        <section class="story-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="story-content">
                    <h2>Our Story</h2>
                    <div class="story-timeline">
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2020</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>The Beginning</h3>
                                <p>After witnessing too many veterans struggling with housing stability, our founder decided to take action. Properties 4 Creations was established with a single mission: provide quality housing for those who served.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2021</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>First Renovations</h3>
                                <p>We purchased and renovated our first property in Tyler, Texas. Every home had to meet our rigorous standards - no shortcuts, no compromises. The first family moved in just before Christmas.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2022</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Growth & Partnerships</h3>
                                <p>We partnered with the VA and local housing authorities to become HUD-VASH and Section 8 certified. Our reputation for quality and veteran-focused service began to grow across East Texas.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2023</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Community Impact</h3>
                                <p>As we expanded to Longview and surrounding areas, we began to see the ripple effect: families stabilized, children thriving in school, veterans finding their footing. This became more than a business - it became a calling.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2024</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Transparency & Standards</h3>
                                <p>We made a commitment to transparency, publishing our renovation standards and cost breakdowns. If we're going to do this, we do it right - no hiding, no cutting corners.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="timeline-item">
                            <div class="timeline-year">2025</div>
                            <div class="timeline-content">
                                <h3>Today & Beyond</h3>
                                <p>Today, we've housed over 20 veterans and families, renovated 25+ properties, and maintained a 100% voucher acceptance rate. But our journey is just beginning. Every home we create is a chance to rebuild a life.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

                <p>Your next chapter starts here. We accept Section 8 and HUD-VASH vouchers.</p>

        <!-- APPLICATION FORM -->
        <section class="form-container">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="form-wrapper">
                    <h1>Application for Housing</h1>
                    <p>Please complete this form to begin your housing application. We'll review your information and contact you within 24-48 hours.</p>

                    <div id="success-message" class="success-message" style="display: none;">
                        ✓ Your application has been submitted successfully! We'll be in touch within 24-48 hours.
                    </div>

                    <form id="application-form" name="application-form">
                        <!-- Personal Information -->
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>Personal Information</legend>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="full-name">Full Legal Name *</label>
                                <input type="text" id="full-name" name="fullName" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Full name is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="email">Email Address *</label>
                                <input type="email" id="email" name="email" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Valid email address is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="phone">Primary Phone Number *</label>
                                <input type="tel" id="phone" name="phone" required pattern="[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+">
                                <span class="error-message">Valid phone number is required (numbers, spaces, dashes, parentheses only)</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="date-of-birth">Date of Birth *</label>
                                <input type="date" id="date-of-birth" name="dateOfBirth" required>
                                <span class="error-message">Date of birth is required</span>
                            </div>
                        </fieldset>

                        <!-- Application Type & Voucher Information -->
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>Housing Assistance</legend>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="applicant-type">How are you applying? *</label>
                                <select id="applicant-type" name="applicantType" required>
                                    <option value="">-- Select an option --</option>
                                    <option value="veteran">Veteran</option>
                                    <option value="spouse">Spouse/Surviving Spouse of Veteran</option>
                                    <option value="family">Family Member</option>
                                    <option value="general">General Applicant</option>
                                    <option value="other">Other</option>
                                </select>
                                <span class="error-message">Please select how you are applying</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="voucher-type">What voucher or housing assistance do you hold? *</label>
                                <select id="voucher-type" name="voucherType" required>
                                    <option value="">-- Select an option --</option>
                                    <option value="hudvash">HUD-VASH (HUD-VA Supportive Housing)</option>
                                    <option value="section8">Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher</option>
                                    <option value="ssvf">SSVF (Supportive Services for Veteran Families)</option>
                                    <option value="rapid_rehousing">Rapid Re-housing</option>
                                    <option value="family_unification">Family Unification Program (FUP)</option>
                                    <option value="other_voucher">Other Voucher Program</option>
                                    <option value="no_voucher">No voucher yet - need guidance</option>
                                </select>
                                <span class="error-message">Please select your housing assistance type</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group" id="military-service-group">
                                <label for="military-service">Military Service (for Veterans) *</label>
                                <select id="military-service" name="militaryService">
                                    <option value="">-- Select branch --</option>
                                    <option value="army">U.S. Army</option>
                                    <option value="navy">U.S. Navy</option>
                                    <option value="air_force">U.S. Air Force</option>
                                    <option value="marines">U.S. Marine Corps</option>
                                    <option value="coast_guard">U.S. Coast Guard</option>
                                    <option value="space_force">U.S. Space Force</option>
                                    <option value="national_guard">National Guard</option>
                                    <option value="reserves">Reserves</option>
                                    <option value="other_active">Other Active Duty</option>
                                    <option value="not_applicable">Not Applicable</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                        </fieldset>

                        <!-- Household Information -->
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>Household Information</legend>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="household-size">Total Number of People in Household (including yourself) *</label>
                                <select id="household-size" name="householdSize" required>
                                    <option value="">-- Select size --</option>
                                    <option value="1">1 Person</option>
                                    <option value="2">2 People</option>
                                    <option value="3">3 People</option>
                                    <option value="4">4 People</option>
                                    <option value="5">5 People</option>

                                    <option value="4">4+ Bedrooms</option>
                                </select>
                                <span class="error-message">Please select preferred bedrooms</span>
                            </div>

                                <input type="number" id="monthly-income" name="monthlyIncome" required min="0" placeholder="$">
                                <span class="error-message">Monthly income is required</span>
                                <small>We use this to verify voucher eligibility and determine appropriate housing</small>

                        </fieldset>

                        <!-- Special Needs & Preferences -->

                            </div>

                                <label for="special-needs">Accessibility or Special Needs</label>
                                <textarea id="special-needs" name="specialNeeds" rows="3" placeholder="e.g., mobility assistance, medical equipment, therapy animals, etc."></textarea>
                                <small>We maintain strict confidentiality for medical information</small>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <label for="additional-info">Additional Information</label>
                                <textarea id="additional-info" name="additionalInfo" rows="3" placeholder="Any other information that might help us serve you better..."></textarea>
                            </div>
                        </fieldset>

                        <!-- Verification & Consent -->
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>Verification & Consent</legend>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <div class="checkbox-group">
                                    <input type="checkbox" id="income-verification" name="incomeVerification" required>
                                    <label for="income-verification" style="margin: 0;">I authorize Properties 4 Creations to verify the information provided, including income and voucher status *</label>
                                </div>
                                <span class="error-message">Authorization is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <div class="checkbox-group">
                                    <input type="checkbox" id="background-check" name="backgroundCheck" required>
                                    <label for="background-check" style="margin: 0;">I understand that a background check may be conducted as part of the leasing process *</label>
                                </div>
                                <span class="error-message">Understanding is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <div class="checkbox-group">
                                    <input type="checkbox" id="fair-housing" name="fairHousing" required>
                                    <label for="fair-housing" style="margin: 0;">I understand that all properties are available on a first-come, first-served basis and comply with Fair Housing Laws *</label>
                                </div>
                                <span class="error-message">Fair Housing understanding is required</span>
                            </div>

                            <div class="form-group">
                                <div class="checkbox-group">
                                    <input type="checkbox" id="privacy-consent" name="privacyConsent" required>
                                    <label for="privacy-consent" style="margin: 0;">I have read and agree to the Privacy Policy and understand how my information will be used *</label>
                                </div>
                                <span class="error-message">Privacy Policy agreement is required</span>
                            </div>
                        </fieldset>

                        <button type="submit" class="submit-btn">Submit Application</button>

                        <p class="legal-notice">
                            <small>This application is confidential and will only be used for housing assistance purposes.
                            You can withdraw this application at any time. We comply with all Fair Housing laws and do not discriminate.</small>
                        </p>
                    </form>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- GUIDANCE SECTION -->
        <section class="impact-snapshot">
            <div class="container">
                <h2>Application Process Overview</h2>
                <div class="process-steps">
                    <div class="process-step">
                        <h3>1. Submit Application</h3>
                        <p>Complete the form above. We'll review within 24-48 hours.</p>
                    </div>
                    <div class="process-step">

                        <p>We'll verify your voucher and income information.</p>
                    </div>

                    </div>
                    <div class="process-step">
                        <h3>4. Lease Signing</h3>
                        <p>Complete leasing paperwork and move into your new home.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>
    </main>

    <!-- FOOTER -->

    <!-- SCRIPTS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/lucide@latest/dist/umd/lucide.js" integrity="sha384-sha384-XcPm71GSOvViJoCA7WCb/9rSD/M3VBABxIZH30y7wbDtwRymtm2Dw2NTumuGrJqB" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
    <script>
        lucide.createIcons();
    </script>
    <script src="public/js/main.js"></script>

    <script>
        // APPLICATION FORM JAVASCRIPT
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const form = document.getElementById('application-form');
            const successMessage = document.getElementById('success-message');
            const applicantType = document.getElementById('applicant-type');
            const militaryGroup = document.getElementById('military-service-group');

            // Show/hide military service field based on applicant type
            applicantType.addEventListener('change', function() {
                if (this.value === 'veteran' || this.value === 'spouse') {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'block';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = true;
                } else {
                    militaryGroup.style.display = 'none';
                    document.getElementById('military-service').required = false;
                }
            });

            form.addEventListener('submit', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();

                let isValid = true;
                const formGroups = form.querySelectorAll('.form-group');

                formGroups.forEach(group => {
                    const input = group.querySelector('input, select, textarea');
                    if (!input) return;

                    group.classList.remove('error');

                    if (input.required && !input.value.trim()) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'email' && input.value && !/^[^\s@]+@[^\s@]+\.[^\s@]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'tel' && input.value && !/^[0-9\-\+\(\)\s]+$/.test(input.value)) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    } else if (input.type === 'checkbox' && !input.checked) {
                        group.classList.add('error');
                        isValid = false;
                    }
                });

                if (isValid) {
                    console.log('Form submitted:', new FormData(form));
                    successMessage.style.display = 'block';
                    form.style.display = 'none';

                    // Reset form after 5 seconds
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        form.reset();
                        form.style.display = 'block';
                        successMessage.style.display = 'none';
                    }, 5000);
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

<!-- ============================================

<button class="btn btn-ghost">Ghost Button</button>

<button class="btn btn-success">Success</button>
<button class="btn btn-danger">Delete</button>
<button class="btn btn-warning">Warning</button>

<!-- Size Variants -->
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-xs">Extra Small</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-sm">Small</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary">Default</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">Large</button>
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-xl">Extra Large</button>

<!-- Icon Buttons -->
<button class="btn btn-primary">
  <i data-lucide="home" class="icon icon-left"></i>
  Home
</button>

<button class="btn btn-primary">
  Next
  <i data-lucide="arrow-right" class="icon icon-right"></i>
</button>

<button class="btn btn-primary btn-icon" aria-label="Search">
  <i data-lucide="search"></i>
</button>

<!-- Loading State (JavaScript controlled) -->
<button class="btn btn-primary" id="submit-btn">Submit</button>
<script>
  // Set loading state
  ButtonUtils.setLoading('#submit-btn', 'Processing...');

  // Remove loading state after operation
  setTimeout(() => {
    ButtonUtils.removeLoading('#submit-btn', 'Success!');
  }, 2000);
</script>

<!-- Disabled State -->
<button class="btn btn-primary" disabled>Disabled Button</button>

<!-- Button Group -->
<div class="btn-group" role="group" aria-label="View options">
  <button class="btn btn-outline active" aria-pressed="true">List</button>
  <button class="btn btn-outline" aria-pressed="false">Grid</button>
  <button class="btn btn-outline" aria-pressed="false">Map</button>
</div>

<!-- Full Width Button -->
<button class="btn btn-primary btn-block">Full Width Button</button>

<!-- Copy to Clipboard Button -->
<button class="btn btn-secondary" data-copy="Text to copy">
  <i data-lucide="copy" class="icon icon-left"></i>
  Copy Code
</button>

<!-- Confirmation Button (Destructive) -->
<button class="btn btn-danger" id="delete-btn">Delete Property</button>
<script>
  ButtonUtils.addConfirmation(
    '#delete-btn',
    'Are you sure?',
    function() {
      // Delete operation here
      console.log('Property deleted');
    }
  );
</script>

<!-- Form Submit Button -->
<form action="/apply" method="POST">
  <input type="email" name="email" required>
  <button type="submit" class="btn btn-primary btn-lg">
    Submit Application
  </button>
</form>

<!-- Link styled as Button -->
<a href="/properties" class="btn btn-primary">Browse Properties</a>

  <button class="btn btn-secondary on-dark">On Dark Background</button>
  <button class="btn btn-ghost on-dark">Ghost on Dark</button>

/* ========================================
   Dark Mode Overrides
   ======================================== */

[data-theme='dark'] {
  --color-primary-navy: #1a2332;
  --color-primary-beige: #1f2937;
  --color-neutral-white: #111827;
  --color-neutral-black: #ffffff;

  --color-neutral-gray-200: #4b5563;

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  :root:not([data-theme='light']) {
    --color-primary-navy: #1a2332;
    --color-primary-beige: #1f2937;
    --color-neutral-white: #111827;
    --color-neutral-black: #ffffff;
    --color-neutral-gray-50: #1f2937;
    --color-neutral-gray-100: #374151;
  }
}

/* ============================================
   BUTTON RIPPLE EFFECT STYLES
   ============================================ */

.btn {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-ripple {
  position: absolute;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
  pointer-events: none;
  transform: scale(0);
  animation: ripple-animation 0.6s ease-out;
}

@keyframes ripple-animation {
  to {
    transform: scale(4);
    opacity: 0;
  }
}

/* Disable ripple for reduced motion */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .btn-ripple {
    display: none;
  }
}

/**
 * Button Component - Properties 4 Creations
 * Enterprise-grade button system with variants, sizes, and states
 */

/* ========================================
   Base Button
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: var(--spacing-2);
  padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-6);
  border: 2px solid transparent;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  font-family: var(--font-family-sans);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
  line-height: 1.5;
  text-decoration: none;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
  user-select: none;
  white-space: nowrap;

  /* Ensure 44x44px touch target (WCAG) */
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;

  /* Prevent layout shift */
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn:focus-visible {
  outline: 3px solid var(--color-primary-gold);
  outline-offset: 4px;
}

.btn:disabled,
.btn[aria-disabled='true'] {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  pointer-events: none;
}

/* ========================================
   Button Variants
   ======================================== */

/* Primary Button */
.btn-primary {
  background: linear-gradient(
    135deg,
    var(--color-primary-gold),
    var(--color-primary-gold-light)
  );
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-6);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold-light);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.btn-primary:active {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
}

/* CTA Button Specific Styles */
.btn-cta {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary-gold), var(--color-primary-gold-light));
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-color: var(--color-primary-gold);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-6);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
  min-width: 160px;
  font-size: var(--font-size-base);
}

  background: var(--color-primary-gold-light);
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
}

  min-height: 60px;
}

  background: var(--color-primary-navy);

  border-color: transparent;
}

}

}

   Button States
   ======================================== */

  position: relative;
  color: transparent;
  pointer-events: none;
}

  content: '';

  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
