  border: 3px solid currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border-top-color: transparent;
  animation: btn-spin 0.6s linear infinite;
}

.btn-loading.btn-primary::after {
  border-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  border-top-color: transparent;
}

@keyframes btn-spin {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* ========================================
   Ripple Effect (Material Design)
   ======================================== */

.btn-ripple {
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.btn-ripple::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
  border-radius: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  transition:
    width 0.6s ease-out,
    height 0.6s ease-out;
}

.btn-ripple:active::before {
  width: 300px;
  height: 300px;
}

/* ========================================
   Icon Buttons
   ======================================== */

.btn-icon {
  padding: var(--spacing-3);
  min-width: 44px;
}

.btn-icon svg,
.btn-icon img {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
}

.btn-icon.btn-sm svg,
.btn-icon.btn-sm img {
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
}

.btn-icon.btn-lg img {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
}

/* Icon with text */
.btn svg:first-child,
.btn img:first-child {
  margin-right: var(--spacing-2);
}

.btn svg:last-child,
.btn img:last-child {
  margin-left: var(--spacing-2);
}

/* ========================================
   Button Group
   ======================================== */

.btn-group {
  display: inline-flex;
  gap: var(--spacing-2);
}

.btn-group .btn {
  flex: 1;
}

.btn-group-vertical {
  flex-direction: column;
}

/* Connected button group */
.btn-group-connected {
  gap: 0;
}

.btn-group-connected .btn {
  border-radius: 0;
}

.btn-group-connected .btn:first-child {
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg) 0 0 var(--radius-lg);
}

.btn-group-connected .btn:last-child {
  border-radius: 0 var(--radius-lg) var(--radius-lg) 0;
}

/* ========================================
   Touch Device Optimizations
   ======================================== */

@media (hover: none) and (pointer: coarse) {
  .btn {
    min-height: 48px;
    padding: var(--spacing-4) var(--spacing-6);
  }

  .btn:active {
    transform: scale(0.98);
  }

  .btn-sm {
    min-height: 44px;
    padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-5);
  }
}

/* ========================================
   Reduced Motion
   ======================================== */

  .btn {
    transition: none;
  }

  .btn-ripple::before {
    transition: none;
  }

  .btn-loading::after {
    animation: none;
  }

  .btn:hover {
    transform: none;
  }
}

  .btn {
    border-width: 3px;
  }

  .btn:focus-visible {
    outline-width: 4px;
  }

}

/**
 * Before/After Comparison Slider Component
 * Interactive slider for showcasing property transformations
 */

/* ========================================
   Comparison Slider Container
   ======================================== */

.comparison-slider {
  padding: var(--spacing-8) 0;
  background: var(--color-neutral-beige);
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.1);
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.1);
}

.comparison-slider .container {
  max-width: 1000px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 var(--spacing-4);
}

.comparison-slider h2 {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-4);
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
}

.comparison-slider p {
  text-align: center;
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-6);
  color: var(--color-neutral-gray-600);
  font-size: var(--font-size-lg);
}

/* ========================================
   Slider Container
   ======================================== */

.slider-container {
  position: relative;
  max-width: 800px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  overflow: hidden;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
  background: var(--color-neutral-white);
}

/* ========================================
   Images
   ======================================== */

.slider-before,
.slider-after {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  object-fit: cover;
  transition: opacity var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
}

.slider-before {
  z-index: 1;
  clip-path: inset(0 50% 0 0);
}

.slider-after {
  z-index: 2;
}

/* ========================================
   Slider Handle
   ======================================== */

.slider-handle {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 50%;
  width: 4px;
  height: 100%;
  background: var(--color-primary-gold);
  z-index: 3;
  cursor: ew-resize;
  transform: translateX(-50%);
  transition: background-color var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
}

.slider-handle::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  background: var(--color-primary-gold);
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 3px solid var(--color-neutral-white);
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-md);
  transition: all var(--duration-base) var(--easing-ease-out);
}

.slider-handle::after {
  content: '↔';
  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  font-size: 20px;
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-bold);
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: 4;
}

.slider-handle:hover {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold-light);
}

.slider-handle:hover::before {
  background: var(--color-primary-gold-light);
  transform: translate(-50%, -50%) scale(1.1);
}

/* ========================================
   Labels
   ======================================== */

.slider-label {
  position: absolute;
  top: 10px;
  background: rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.8);
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  padding: var(--spacing-2) var(--spacing-4);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-semibold);
  pointer-events: none;
  z-index: 4;
}

  left: 10px;
}

  right: 10px;
}

  }

    width: 50px;
    height: 50px;
  }

  border: 0;

  }

/**

   ======================================== */

  position: relative;
}

  margin-bottom: 0;
}

/* ========================================
   Form Label
   ======================================== */

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: var(--font-size-sm);
  font-weight: var(--font-weight-medium);
  color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  margin-bottom: var(--spacing-2);
}

  content: ' *';
  color: var(--color-semantic-error);
}

/* ========================================
   Form Control (Input, Select, Textarea)
   ======================================== */

  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-4);
  font-family: var(--font-family-sans);
  font-size: var(--font-size-base); /* 16px prevents iOS zoom */

    border-color var(--duration-fast) var(--easing-ease-out),
    box-shadow var(--duration-fast) var(--easing-ease-out);

  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85);

    padding: var(--spacing-3) var(--spacing-6);
  }

  .brand-text {
    font-size: var(--font-size-2xl);
  }

/**

/* ========================================
   Base Hero Section
   ======================================== */

.hero {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 60vh;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  text-align: center;
  color: var(--color-neutral-white);
  background-color: var(--color-primary-navy);
  background-size: cover;
  background-position: center;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  overflow: hidden;
}

   Hero Content Container
   ======================================== */

  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
  max-width: 800px;

  background: rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.85);
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);

/* Generated automatically for performance optimization */

:root {
  /* Brand Colors */
  --color-primary-navy: #0b1120;
  --color-primary-wood: #c28e5a;
  --color-primary-walnut: #8b5e3c;
  --color-primary-beige: #f5f1e8;

  /* Typography */
  --font-family-primary: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, sans-serif;
  --font-family-heading: 'Merriweather', Georgia, serif;

  /* Spacing */
  --spacing-xs: 0.25rem;
  --spacing-sm: 0.5rem;
  --spacing-md: 1rem;
  --spacing-lg: 1.5rem;
  --spacing-xl: 2rem;
  --spacing-2xl: 3rem;

  /* Border radius */
  --radius-sm: 0.125rem;
  --radius-md: 0.375rem;
  --radius-lg: 0.5rem;

  /* Shadows */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);

  /* Transitions */
  --transition-fast: 150ms ease-in-out;
  --transition-normal: 300ms ease-in-out;
  --transition-slow: 500ms ease-in-out;
}

  box-sizing: border-box;

/* ============================================
   ENHANCED BUTTON SYSTEM FOR PROPERTIES 4 CREATIONS
   ============================================ */

/* BASE BUTTON STYLES - Enhanced from current implementation */
.btn {
  /* Existing properties preserved */
  padding: var(--btn-padding, 0.75rem 1.5rem);
  border: none;
  border-radius: var(--btn-border-radius, 5px);
  font-weight: var(--btn-font-weight, 600);
  cursor: pointer;
  text-decoration: none;
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0.5rem; /* NEW - spacing for icons */
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  font-size: 1rem;
  line-height: 1.5;

  /* Enhanced transitions */
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);

  /* Improved focus state */
  outline: 2px solid transparent;
  outline-offset: 2px;
  position: relative;

  /* Prevent text selection on clicks */
  user-select: none;
  -webkit-user-select: none;

  /* Better touch targets for mobile */
  min-height: 44px;
  min-width: 44px;
}

/* Enhanced focus states for accessibility */
.btn:focus-visible {
  outline-color: var(--gold);
  outline-offset: 3px;
  outline-width: 3px;
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 4px rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.2);
}

/* Disabled state - CRITICAL ADDITION */
.btn:disabled,
.btn[aria-disabled='true'] {
  opacity: 0.5;
  cursor: not-allowed;
  pointer-events: none;
  filter: grayscale(30%);
}

/* Loading state - NEW FEATURE */
.btn.loading {
  color: transparent;
  pointer-events: none;
  position: relative;
}

.btn.loading::after {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  width: 16px;
  height: 16px;
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  margin-left: -8px;
  margin-top: -8px;
  border: 2px solid currentColor;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border-top-color: transparent;
  animation: btn-spinner 0.6s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes btn-spinner {
  to {
    transform: rotate(360deg);
  }
}

/* ============================================
   PRIMARY BUTTON (Enhanced existing)
   ============================================ */
.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--gold);
  color: var(--navy);
  border: 2px solid var(--gold);
}

.btn-primary:hover:not(:disabled) {
  background-color: #d99a6a;
  border-color: #d99a6a;
  transform: translateY(-2px);
  box-shadow: 0 6px 20px rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.4);
}

.btn-primary:active:not(:disabled) {
  transform: translateY(0);
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.3);
}

  background-color: transparent;
  color: white;
  border: 2px solid var(--gold);

  background-color: var(--gold);

}

  transform: translateY(0);
}

/* Dark background variant */

  color: var(--gold);
  border-color: var(--gold);
}

  background-color: var(--gold);
  color: var(--navy);
}

  background: none;
  border: none;
  cursor: pointer;

  position: relative;

  min-height: 44px;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

}

  background-color: rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.1);
}

  outline: 2px solid var(--gold);
  outline-offset: 2px;
}

  width: 25px;
  height: 3px;
  background-color: white;
  border-radius: 2px;
  transition: all 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  display: block;
}

  transform: rotate(45deg) translate(7px, 7px);
}

.menu-toggle.active span:nth-child(2) {
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateX(-10px);
}

.menu-toggle.active span:nth-child(3) {
  transform: rotate(-45deg) translate(7px, -7px);
}

/* ============================================
   RESPONSIVE ADJUSTMENTS
   ============================================ */

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .menu-toggle {
    display: flex;
  }

  /* Stack buttons on mobile */
  .btn-group {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .btn-group .btn {
    border-right-width: 2px;
    border-bottom-width: 1px;
  }

  .btn-group .btn:first-child {
    border-radius: 5px 5px 0 0;
  }

  .btn-group .btn:last-child {
    border-radius: 0 0 5px 5px;
    border-bottom-width: 2px;
  }

  /* Reduce padding on smaller screens */
  .btn {
    padding: 0.625rem 1.25rem;
  }

  .btn-lg {
    padding: 0.875rem 1.75rem;
  }
}

/* ============================================
   ACCESSIBILITY ENHANCEMENTS
   ============================================ */

/* High contrast mode support */
@media (prefers-contrast: high) {
  .btn {
    border-width: 3px;
  }

  .btn:focus-visible {
    outline-width: 4px;
  }
}

/* Reduced motion support */
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  .btn,
  .menu-toggle span {
    transition: none;
  }

  .btn:hover {
    transform: none;
  }
}

/* Print styles */
@media print {
  .btn {
    border: 2px solid currentColor !important;
    box-shadow: none !important;
  }
}

@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Merriweather:wght@400;700&family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&display=swap');

:root {
  --navy: #0b1120;
  --gold: #c28e5a;
  --beige: #f5f5f0;
  --dark-gray: #2a2a2a;
  --light-gray: #f0f0f0;

  /* Common design tokens */
  --shadow-sm: 0 2px 8px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.1);
  --shadow-md: 0 4px 12px rgba(11, 17, 32, 0.15);
  --shadow-lg: 0 6px 20px rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.4);
  --border-radius-lg: 10px;
  --border-radius-sm: 5px;
  --spacing-lg: 2rem;
  --spacing-md: 1.5rem;
  --spacing-sm: 1rem;

  /* Button base styles */
  --btn-padding: 0.75rem 1.5rem;
  --btn-border-radius: 5px;
  --btn-font-weight: 600;
  --btn-transition: all 0.3s;
}

* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: 'Inter', sans-serif;
  background-color: var(--beige);
  color: var(--navy);
  line-height: 1.6;
}

/* Enhanced color contrast for accessibility */
.text-navy-on-beige {
  color: var(--navy);
  background-color: var(--beige);
}

.text-navy-on-white {
  color: var(--navy);
  background-color: var(--white);
}

.text-gold-on-navy {
  color: var(--gold);
  background-color: var(--navy);
}

.text-white-on-navy {
  color: var(--white);
  background-color: var(--navy);
}

/* Ensure sufficient contrast for all text elements */
h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  color: var(--navy);
}

p, span, div {
  color: var(--navy);
}

/* High contrast links */
a {
  color: var(--navy);
  text-decoration: none;
}

a:hover, a:focus {
  color: var(--gold);
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Form labels and inputs with high contrast */
label {
  color: var(--navy);
  font-weight: 600;
}

input, select, textarea {
  color: var(--navy);
  border-color: #ccc;
}

input:focus, select:focus, textarea:focus {
  border-color: var(--gold);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(194, 142, 90, 0.2);
}

/* HEADER & NAVIGATION */
.header-glass {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;

}

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE: docs\design-system\DESIGN_PRINCIPLES\index.html
SIZE: 12297 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-24 09:33:28
================================================================================
<h1>Design Principles - Properties 4 Creations</h1>
<h2>Overview</h2>
<p>This document outlines the design principles, visual language, and guidelines for the Properties 4 Creations housing platform serving <strong>families and veterans</strong> in East Texas. These principles ensure consistency, accessibility, and a professional user experience across all touchpoints.</p>
<hr>
<h2>Core Values</h2>
<h3>1. Family &amp; Veteran-First Design</h3>
<ul>
<li>Design with dignity, respect, and accessibility as primary concerns for all families and veterans</li>
<li>Use clear, straightforward language without jargon</li>
<li>Provide multiple pathways to complete tasks</li>
<li>Ensure all critical information is easily discoverable</li>
<li>Consider diverse family structures and needs</li>
<li>Honor veteran service while welcoming all eligible families</li>
</ul>
<h3>2. Transparency &amp; Trust</h3>
<ul>
<li>Clear information hierarchy with honest communication</li>
<li>No hidden fees, terms, or conditions</li>
<li>Progress indicators for multi-step processes</li>
<li>Consistent, predictable interface patterns</li>
</ul>
<h3>3. Accessibility (WCAG 2.2 AA)</h3>
<ul>
<li>Minimum 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text</li>
<li>44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>Full keyboard navigation support</li>
<li>Screen reader compatibility</li>
<li>Respect user preferences (reduced motion, color scheme)</li>
</ul>
<h3>4. Performance</h3>
<ul>
<li>Core Web Vitals compliance (LCP &lt;2.5s, FID &lt;100ms, CLS &lt;0.1)</li>
<li>Progressive enhancement approach</li>
<li>Offline-first PWA capabilities</li>
<li>Optimized images and assets</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Visual Language</h2>
<h3>Color Palette</h3>
<h4>Primary Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Navy</td>
<td><code>#0B1120</code></td>
<td>Brand, headers, CTAs, primary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Gold</td>
<td><code>#C28E5A</code></td>
<td>Accents, highlights, interactive elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Beige</td>
<td><code>#F5F5F0</code></td>
<td>Backgrounds, cards</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Semantic Colors</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Color</th>
<th>Hex</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>Error</td>
<td><code>#D32F2F</code></td>
<td>Error states, destructive actions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Success</td>
<td><code>#388E3C</code></td>
<td>Success states, confirmations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Warning</td>
<td><code>#F57C00</code></td>
<td>Warnings, cautions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>Info</td>
<td><code>#1976D2</code></td>
<td>Informational messages</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h4>Neutral Colors</h4>
<ul>
<li>White (<code>#FFFFFF</code>) - Card backgrounds, text on dark</li>
<li>Gray scale (<code>#F9FAFB</code> to <code>#111827</code>) - Borders, secondary text, dividers</li>
<li>Black (<code>#000000</code>) - High contrast text when needed</li>
</ul>
<h3>Typography</h3>
<h4>Font Families</h4>
<ul>
<li><strong>Headings</strong>: Merriweather (serif) - Conveys trust and professionalism</li>
<li><strong>Body</strong>: System fonts (-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto) - Optimal readability</li>
<li><strong>Code</strong>: Monaco, Courier New (monospace) - Technical content</li>
</ul>
<h4>Type Scale</h4>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Size</th>
<th>Line Height</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>1rem</td>
<td>Captions, labels</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.875rem (14px)</td>
<td>1.25rem</td>
<td>Secondary text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>1.5rem</td>
<td>Body text</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1.125rem (18px)</td>
<td>1.75rem</td>
<td>Lead paragraphs</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>1.25rem (20px)</td>
<td>1.75rem</td>
<td>H4 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2xl</td>
<td>1.5rem (24px)</td>
<td>2rem</td>
<td>H3 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>3xl</td>
<td>1.875rem (30px)</td>
<td>2.25rem</td>
<td>H2 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>4xl</td>
<td>2.25rem (36px)</td>
<td>2.5rem</td>
<td>H1 headings</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>5xl</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>1</td>
<td>Hero titles</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Spacing System</h3>
<p>Based on an 8px grid system for consistent rhythm:</p>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>spacing-1</td>
<td>0.25rem (4px)</td>
<td>Tight spacing, icons</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-2</td>
<td>0.5rem (8px)</td>
<td>Inline elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-3</td>
<td>0.75rem (12px)</td>
<td>Small gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-4</td>
<td>1rem (16px)</td>
<td>Standard spacing</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-6</td>
<td>1.5rem (24px)</td>
<td>Section padding</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-8</td>
<td>2rem (32px)</td>
<td>Large gaps</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-12</td>
<td>3rem (48px)</td>
<td>Section margins</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>spacing-16</td>
<td>4rem (64px)</td>
<td>Page sections</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Shadows</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Level</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>Subtle depth for inputs</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>Cards at rest</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>Cards on hover</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>Modals, dropdowns</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>Floating elements</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Border Radius</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>0.125rem</td>
<td>Subtle rounding</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>0.25rem</td>
<td>Inputs, small elements</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>0.375rem</td>
<td>Buttons</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>0.5rem</td>
<td>Cards</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>0.75rem</td>
<td>Large cards</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>full</td>
<td>9999px</td>
<td>Pills, avatars</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<hr>
<h2>Component Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Buttons</h3>
<h4>Variants</h4>
<ol>
<li><strong>Primary</strong> - Main CTAs (gold background, navy text)</li>
<li><strong>Secondary</strong> - Secondary actions (navy outline)</li>
<li><strong>Tertiary</strong> - Low-emphasis actions (text only)</li>
<li><strong>Danger</strong> - Destructive actions (red)</li>
</ol>
<h4>States</h4>
<ul>
<li>Default, Hover, Active, Focus, Disabled, Loading</li>
</ul>
<h4>Sizing</h4>
<ul>
<li>Small: 36px height, 14px text</li>
<li>Medium: 44px height, 16px text (default)</li>
<li>Large: 52px height, 18px text</li>
</ul>
<h4>Rules</h4>
<ul>
<li>Always include visible focus indicator</li>
<li>Minimum 44x44px touch target</li>
<li>Use loading state for async actions</li>
<li>Include icon + text for important actions</li>
</ul>
<h3>Cards</h3>
<h4>Property Cards</h4>
<ul>
<li>Image with lazy loading</li>
<li>Title (H3)</li>
<li>Address</li>
<li>Features (beds, baths, sqft)</li>
<li>Tags (Section 8, HUD-VASH, Pet Friendly)</li>
<li>CTA button</li>
</ul>
<h4>Hover Effects</h4>
<ul>
<li>Subtle lift (translateY -4px)</li>
<li>Shadow increase</li>
<li>Image zoom (scale 1.05)</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<h4>Input Fields</h4>
<ul>
<li>Clear labels above inputs</li>
<li>Placeholder text for examples only</li>
<li>Error messages below with icon</li>
<li>Success state on valid input</li>
<li>16px minimum font size (prevents iOS zoom)</li>
</ul>
<h4>Validation</h4>
<ul>
<li>Real-time validation on blur</li>
<li>Clear error messages with recovery path</li>
<li>Use aria-live for screen reader announcements</li>
</ul>
<h3>Navigation</h3>
<h4>Header</h4>
<ul>
<li>Sticky on scroll</li>
<li>Glass morphism effect</li>
<li>Mobile hamburger menu at 768px</li>
<li>Skip navigation link</li>
</ul>
<h4>Mobile Menu</h4>
<ul>
<li>Full-screen overlay</li>
<li>Focus trap when open</li>
<li>Close on Escape key</li>
<li>Animate from left</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>Motion Guidelines</h2>
<h3>Duration</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>instant</td>
<td>0ms</td>
<td>Immediate feedback</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>fast</td>
<td>150ms</td>
<td>Micro-interactions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>base</td>
<td>250ms</td>
<td>Standard transitions</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slow</td>
<td>350ms</td>
<td>Complex animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>slower</td>
<td>500ms</td>
<td>Page transitions</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Easing</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Token</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Usage</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>easeOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Enter animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeIn</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 1, 1)</td>
<td>Exit animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>easeInOut</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)</td>
<td>Move animations</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>bounce</td>
<td>cubic-bezier(0.68, -0.55, 0.265, 1.55)</td>
<td>Playful feedback</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Reduced Motion</h3>
<p>Always respect <code>prefers-reduced-motion</code>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  * {
    animation-duration: 0.01ms !important;
    transition-duration: 0.01ms !important;
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Responsive Design</h2>
<h3>Breakpoints</h3>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Name</th>
<th>Value</th>
<th>Target</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>xs</td>
<td>320px</td>
<td>Small phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>sm</td>
<td>640px</td>
<td>Large phones</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>md</td>
<td>768px</td>
<td>Tablets</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>lg</td>
<td>1024px</td>
<td>Laptops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>xl</td>
<td>1280px</td>
<td>Desktops</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>2xl</td>
<td>1536px</td>
<td>Large screens</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<h3>Mobile-First Approach</h3>
<p>Write base styles for mobile, then add complexity:</p>
<pre><code class="language-css">/* Mobile (default) */
.grid { grid-template-columns: 1fr; }

/* Tablet */
@media (min-width: 768px) {
  .grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); }
}

/* Desktop */
@media (min-width: 1024px) {
  .grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Accessibility Checklist</h2>
<h3>Color &amp; Contrast</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Text contrast ratio ≥ 4.5:1 (AA)</li>
<li>[ ] Large text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Non-text contrast ratio ≥ 3:1</li>
<li>[ ] Don't rely on color alone for meaning</li>
</ul>
<h3>Keyboard Navigation</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] All interactive elements focusable</li>
<li>[ ] Visible focus indicators</li>
<li>[ ] Logical tab order</li>
<li>[ ] Skip navigation link</li>
<li>[ ] Escape closes modals/menus</li>
</ul>
<h3>Screen Readers</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Semantic HTML structure</li>
<li>[ ] Proper heading hierarchy (H1 → H2 → H3)</li>
<li>[ ] Alt text for images</li>
<li>[ ] ARIA labels for icons/buttons</li>
<li>[ ] Live regions for dynamic content</li>
</ul>
<h3>Forms</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] Labels associated with inputs</li>
<li>[ ] Error messages linked with aria-describedby</li>
<li>[ ] Required fields marked with aria-required</li>
<li>[ ] Form validation announced</li>
</ul>
<h3>Touch</h3>
<ul>
<li>[ ] 44x44px minimum touch targets</li>
<li>[ ] 8px minimum spacing between targets</li>
<li>[ ] No hover-only interactions</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>File Naming Conventions</h2>
<h3>Images</h3>
<pre><code>[type]-[location]-[description].[ext]
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>hero-home-banner.webp</code></li>
<li><code>properties-tyler-ranch-home.webp</code></li>
<li><code>icon-section-8.svg</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>CSS Classes (BEM)</h3>
<pre><code>.block__element--modifier
</code></pre>
<p>Examples:</p>
<ul>
<li><code>.property-card</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card__image</code></li>
<li><code>.property-card--featured</code></li>
</ul>
<h3>JavaScript</h3>
<pre><code>camelCase for variables/functions
PascalCase for classes
UPPER_SNAKE_CASE for constants
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>Version History</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>Version</th>
<th>Date</th>
<th>Changes</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td>1.0.0</td>
<td>2025-12-15</td>
<td>Initial design system documentation</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>

                <ul class="nav-menu" id="nav-menu">

    <main id="main">
        <!-- FAQ HEADER -->
        <section class="page-banner" style="background-image: url('public/images/banners/hero-home-banner.webp'); background-size: cover; background-position: center;">
            <div class="container">
                <h1>Frequently Asked Questions</h1>
                <p>Answers to common questions about our veteran housing services</p>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- FAQ SECTION -->
        <section class="faq-section">
            <div class="container">
                <div class="accordion faq-container" id="faq-accordion">
                    <div class="accordion__item faq-item">
                        <button class="accordion__button faq-question" type="button">
                            <span>How do I apply for housing with Properties 4 Creations?</span>
                            <span class="accordion__icon" aria-hidden="true">
                                <svg width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2">
                                    <polyline points="6 9 12 15 18 9"/>
                                </svg>
                            </span>
                        </button>
                        <div class="accordion__panel faq-answer">
                            <p>You can start your application by clicking the "Apply Now" button on any page or visiting our <a href="apply.html" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">application page</a>. The process involves:</p>
                            <ol>
                                <li>Completing our online application form with your personal information</li>
                                <li>Providing details about your housing voucher and income</li>
                                <li>Allowing 24-48 hours for our team to review your application</li>
                                <li>Scheduling a property viewing if you're approved</li>
                                <li>Completing the lease signing process</li>
                            </ol>
                            <p>Our veteran team is here to guide you through each step.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Do you accept Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>Yes, we accept 100% of Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers.</strong> We are committed to helping voucher holders find quality housing without discrimination. Here's what you need to know:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>We accept vouchers from any housing authority</li>
                                <li>No application fees or discriminatory screening</li>
                                <li>Properties are pre-inspected and Section 8 ready</li>
                                <li>Our team handles all voucher coordination with your housing authority</li>
                                <li>Transparent process with clear communication at every step</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>If you have questions about voucher acceptance, <a href="contact.html" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">contact us directly</a>.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What about HUD-VASH for veterans?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We are fully HUD-VASH approved</strong> and actively partner with the VA to house veterans. As a veteran-owned company, we understand the unique needs of our fellow service members.</p>
                            <p>HUD-VASH benefits include:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Direct coordination with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Veterans receive priority consideration</li>
                                <li>Specialized veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Ongoing support during the transition to housing</li>
                                <li>Understanding of military culture and experiences</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>If you're working with the VA on housing, we can help streamline the process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What areas do you serve in East Texas?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>We serve communities across East Texas, focusing on areas with strong veteran populations and good access to services:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Primary Markets:</strong> Tyler, Longview</li>
                                <li><strong>Secondary Markets:</strong> Marshall, Jefferson, Mineola, Kemp</li>
                                <li><strong>Surrounding Areas:</strong> Nacogdoches, Palestine, Kilgore, White Oak</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Our properties are strategically located near:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>VA medical centers and outpatient clinics</li>
                                <li>Public transportation routes</li>
                                <li>Employment opportunities and job training centers</li>
                                <li>Schools and community services</li>
                                <li>Grocery stores and essential services</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What makes Properties 4 Creations different from other landlords?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We're veteran-owned and operated</strong>, which means we bring a unique understanding to housing for veterans and families. Here's what sets us apart:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>100% Voucher Acceptance:</strong> We welcome Section 8 and HUD-VASH without discrimination</li>
                                <li><strong>Premium Renovations:</strong> Every property meets our rigorous $30,000+ renovation standards</li>
                                <li><strong>Transparency:</strong> We publish our renovation standards and cost breakdowns</li>
                                <li><strong>Quality Guarantees:</strong> Comprehensive warranties on all systems</li>
                                <li><strong>Veteran Understanding:</strong> We understand military culture and challenges</li>
                                <li><strong>Community Focus:</strong> We're invested in rebuilding East Texas communities</li>
                                <li><strong>Fair Housing Compliance:</strong> Strict adherence to all anti-discrimination laws</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Are all your properties recently renovated?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>Yes, every property undergoes comprehensive renovation</strong> before becoming available. Our renovation process includes:</p>
                            <h4>Core Systems (12-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Complete HVAC system replacement and certification</li>
                                <li>Full roof replacement with premium materials</li>
                                <li>New plumbing throughout with copper pipes</li>
                                <li>Modern electrical systems with code compliance</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Interior Finishes (6-month warranties)</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Professional painting throughout</li>
                                <li>New or refinished flooring</li>
                                <li>Updated kitchens with new appliances</li>
                                <li>Modern bathrooms with new fixtures</li>
                                <li>Fresh fixtures and lighting</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>See our complete <a href="transparency.html" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">renovation standards</a> for full details.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>How long does the application process take?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>The timeline varies based on your voucher status and property availability:</p>
                            <h4>For Applicants with Active Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li><strong>Document Verification:</strong> 1-3 business days</li>
                                <li><strong>Property Viewing:</strong> Same week if approved</li>
                                <li><strong>Lease Signing:</strong> Within 1-2 weeks</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>For Applicants Without Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li><strong>Application Review:</strong> 24-48 hours</li>
                                <li><strong>Voucher Guidance:</strong> We'll help connect you with local housing authorities</li>
                                <li><strong>Timeline:</strong> Depends on housing authority waitlist status</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We'll keep you informed throughout the entire process.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What if I don't have a housing voucher yet?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We can help guide you through the voucher process.</strong> Here's how we assist applicants without vouchers:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Help you understand eligibility requirements</li>
                                <li>Connect you with local housing authorities</li>
                                <li>Guide you through application processes</li>
                                <li>Monitor waitlist openings</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH for Veterans</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Coordinate with your VA case manager</li>
                                <li>Provide documentation of our veteran-friendly properties</li>
                                <li>Support the voucher application process</li>
                                <li>Expedite property matching once voucher is issued</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us to discuss your situation and we'll create a personalized plan.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What are your income requirements?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Income requirements vary by program and are set by the housing authorities, but generally:</p>
                            <h4>Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Typically 50% or below Area Median Income (AMI)</li>
                                <li>For East Texas (2025): Single person maximum ≈ $19,750/year</li>
                                <li>Four-person household maximum ≈ $28,200/year</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>HUD-VASH</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Usually 50% or below AMI</li>
                                <li>Special considerations for homeless veterans</li>
                                <li>Case-by-case evaluation for extreme circumstances</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We can help you determine if you meet current income requirements for your area.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Do you accommodate families with children?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>Absolutely. We welcome families of all sizes.</strong> Our properties include:</p>
                            <ul>
                                <li>2, 3, and 4-bedroom homes for larger families</li>
                                <li>Properties near quality schools and family services</li>
                                <li>Safe neighborhoods with family amenities</li>
                                <li>Yard space and family-friendly layouts</li>
                                <li>Proximity to pediatric healthcare and family services</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>We understand the importance of stable housing for children's development and academic success.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What if I have a disability and need accessibility features?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We provide reasonable accommodations and accessibility modifications.</strong> Our accessibility commitment includes:</p>
                            <h4>Existing Features</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Wide doorways in common areas</li>
                                <li>Ground-floor units available</li>
                                <li>Step-free entrances where possible</li>
                                <li>Accessible bathroom features</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Available Modifications</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Ramp installations</li>
                                <li>Grab bar additions</li>
                                <li>Accessible shower conversions</li>
                                <li>Visual alert systems</li>
                                <li>Other reasonable modifications as needed</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us to discuss your specific accessibility needs. We work with each applicant individually.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>Can I bring my service animal or pet?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p><strong>We accommodate service animals and have pet-friendly policies.</strong></p>
                            <h4>Service Animals</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Always welcome, no restrictions</li>
                                <li>Must meet ADA requirements</li>
                                <li>No additional fees for service animals</li>
                                <li>Reasonable accommodations for training needs</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Pets</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Many properties are pet-friendly</li>
                                <li>Breed and size restrictions may apply</li>
                                <li>Pet deposits and fees may apply</li>
                                <li>Additional screening for pet compatibility</li>
                            </ul>
                            <p>Contact us about specific pet policies for individual properties.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>What happens after I move in?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>Our relationship doesn't end at move-in. We provide ongoing support:</p>
                            <h4>First 30 Days</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Check-in call to ensure everything is working properly</li>
                                <li>Warranty support for any issues</li>
                                <li>Community integration assistance</li>
                                <li>VA or housing authority coordination as needed</li>
                            </ul>
                            <h4>Ongoing Support</h4>
                            <ul>
                                <li>Maintenance support through our preferred vendors</li>
                                <li>Annual property inspections as required by programs</li>
                                <li>Renewal assistance for voucher holders</li>
                                <li>Emergency contact availability</li>
                                <li>Community building events and veteran support groups</li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <div class="faq-item">
                        <div class="faq-question">
                            <span>How can I contact Properties 4 Creations?</span>
                            <i data-lucide="chevron-down" class="faq-icon"></i>
                        </div>
                        <div class="faq-answer">
                            <p>We're here to help! Contact us through:</p>
                            <div style="display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr)); gap: 1rem; margin: 1rem 0;">
                                <div style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                    <h5><i data-lucide="phone"></i> Phone</h5>
                                    <p><a href="tel:+19035551234" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">(903) 555-1234</a></p>
                                    <p>Mon-Fri: 9AM-5PM<br>Sat: 10AM-2PM</p>
                                </div>
                                <div style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                    <h5><i data-lucide="mail"></i> Email</h5>
                                    <p><a href="mailto:info@properties4creations.com" style="color: var(--gold); font-weight: 600;">info@properties4creations.com</a></p>
                                    <p>Response within 24 hours</p>
                                </div>
                                <div style="background: white; padding: 1rem; border-radius: 8px; border-left: 4px solid var(--gold);">
                                    <h5><i data-lucide="map-pin"></i> Service Area</h5>
                                    <p>Tyler & Longview<br>East Texas</p>
                                    <p>In-person meetings by appointment</p>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <p>For urgent housing emergencies, call our main number and select the emergency option.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </section>

        <!-- STILL HAVE QUESTIONS -->

    <script>
        // MAP INITIALIZATION
        if (document.getElementById('map')) {
            const script = document.createElement('script');
            script.src = 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/leaflet@1.9.4/dist/leaflet.js';
            script.integrity = 'sha256-20nQCchB9co0qIjJZRGuk2/Z9VM+kNiyxNV1lvTlZBo=';
            script.crossOrigin = 'anonymous';
            script.onload = () => {
                const map = L.map('map').setView([32.35, -95.3], 10);
                L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
                    attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors',
                    maxZoom: 19
                }).addTo(map);

                L.marker([32.351, -95.301], {
                    title: 'Tyler Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Tyler, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');

                L.marker([32.50, -94.74], {
                    title: 'Longview Properties'
                }).addTo(map).bindPopup('<b>Longview, TX</b><br>Multiple Properties Available');
            };
            document.head.appendChild(script);
        }
    </script>

    </header>

FILE: docs\js\accessibility-enhanced.js
SIZE: 7245 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-24 10:51:52

(function () {
  'use strict';
  function initializeSkipLinks () {
    const skipLink = document.querySelector('.skip-link');
    const mainContent = document.getElementById('main');
    if (skipLink && mainContent) {
      skipLink.href = '#main';
      skipLink.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        e.preventDefault();
        mainContent.focus();
        mainContent.setAttribute('tabindex', '-1');
      });
    }
  }
  function enhanceKeyboardNavigation () {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
      const target = e.target;
      if (
        target.classList.contains('property-card') &&
        (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ')
      ) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const link = target.querySelector('a');
        if (link) {
          link.click();
        }
      }
      if (
        target.classList.contains('cta-link') &&
        (e.key === 'Enter' || e.key === ' ')
      ) {
        e.preventDefault();
        window.location.href = target.href;
      }
    });
  }
  function initializeMobileMenu () {
    const menuToggle = document.querySelector('.menu-toggle');
    const mainNav = document.querySelector('.main-navigation');
    if (menuToggle && mainNav) {
      menuToggle.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const expanded = menuToggle.getAttribute('aria-expanded') === 'true';
        menuToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', String(!expanded));
        mainNav.setAttribute('aria-hidden', String(expanded));
      });
      document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if (!mainNav.contains(e.target) && !menuToggle.contains(e.target)) {
          menuToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
          mainNav.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');
        }
      });
      document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
        if (e.key === 'Escape') {
          menuToggle.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
          mainNav.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');
          menuToggle.focus();
        }
      });
    }
  }
  function initializeAriaLiveRegions () {
    if (!document.getElementById('filter-status')) {
      const liveRegion = document.createElement('div');
      liveRegion.id = 'filter-status';
      liveRegion.setAttribute('aria-live', 'polite');
      liveRegion.setAttribute('aria-atomic', 'true');
      liveRegion.className = 'sr-only';
      document.body.appendChild(liveRegion);
    }
    if (!document.getElementById('form-status')) {
      const formRegion = document.createElement('div');
      formRegion.id = 'form-status';
      formRegion.setAttribute('aria-live', 'assertive');
      formRegion.setAttribute('aria-atomic', 'true');
      formRegion.className = 'sr-only';
      document.body.appendChild(formRegion);
    }
  }
  function initializeScreenReaderText () {
    if (!document.getElementById('sr-styles')) {
      const srStyles = document.createElement('style');
      srStyles.id = 'sr-styles';
      srStyles.textContent = `
                .sr-only {
                    position: absolute;
                    width: 1px;
                    height: 1px;
                    padding: 0;
                    margin: -1px;
                    overflow: hidden;
                    clip: rect(0, 0, 0, 0);
                    white-space: nowrap;
                    border: 0;
                }
            `;
      document.head.appendChild(srStyles);
    }
  }
  function enhanceFocusManagement () {
    document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
      if (e.key === 'Escape') {
        const activeModal = document.querySelector('.modal.active');
        if (activeModal) {
          closeModal(activeModal);
        }
      }
    });
    function closeModal (modal) {
      modal.classList.remove('active');
      modal.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');
      const trigger = document.querySelector(`[data-modal='${modal.id}']`);
      if (trigger) {
        trigger.focus();
      }
    }
  }
  function validateAltText () {
    const images = document.querySelectorAll('img');
    let missingAltCount = 0;
    images.forEach((img) => {
      if (!img.alt || img.alt.trim() === '') {
        missingAltCount++;
        if (
          window.location.hostname === 'localhost' ||
          window.location.hostname === '127.0.0.1'
        ) {
          img.style.outline = '3px solid #ff6b6b';
          img.style.outlineOffset = '2px';
        }
      }
    });
    if (missingAltCount > 0) {
    }
  }
  function enhanceFormAccessibility () {
    const forms = document.querySelectorAll('form');
    forms.forEach((form) => {
      const inputs = form.querySelectorAll('input, select, textarea');
      inputs.forEach((input) => {
        if (
          !input.getAttribute('aria-label') &&
          !input.getAttribute('aria-labelledby')
        ) {
          const label = form.querySelector(`label[for='${input.id}']`);
          if (!label && input.id) {
          }
        }
        input.addEventListener('invalid', () => {
          const formGroup = input.closest('.form-group');
          if (formGroup) {
            formGroup.classList.add('error');
            const errorMsg = formGroup.querySelector('.error-message');
            if (errorMsg && input.id) {
              input.setAttribute(
                'aria-describedby',
                errorMsg.id || `error-${input.id}`
              );
              errorMsg.id = errorMsg.id || `error-${input.id}`;
            }
          }
        });
        input.addEventListener('input', () => {
          const formGroup = input.closest('.form-group');
          if (formGroup && formGroup.classList.contains('error')) {
            formGroup.classList.remove('error');
            input.removeAttribute('aria-describedby');
          }
        });
      });
    });
  }
  function enhanceNavigationLandmarks () {
    const nav = document.querySelector('nav');
    if (nav && !nav.getAttribute('aria-label')) {
      nav.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Main navigation');
    }
    const footerNav = document.querySelector('.footer-section ul');
    if (footerNav && !footerNav.getAttribute('aria-label')) {
      footerNav.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Footer links');
    }
  }
  function initAccessibility () {
    initializeSkipLinks();
    enhanceKeyboardNavigation();
    initializeMobileMenu();
    initializeAriaLiveRegions();
    initializeScreenReaderText();
    enhanceFocusManagement();
    validateAltText();
    enhanceFormAccessibility();
    enhanceNavigationLandmarks();
    const statusRegion = document.getElementById('form-status');
    if (statusRegion) {
      statusRegion.textContent = 'Accessibility enhancements loaded';
      setTimeout(() => {
        statusRegion.textContent = '';
      }, 1000);
    }
  }
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initAccessibility);
  } else {
    initAccessibility();
  }
  window.AccessibilityEnhancer = {
    validateAltText: validateAltText,
    enhanceFormAccessibility: enhanceFormAccessibility
  };
})();

FILE: docs\js\button-utilities.js
SIZE: 5440 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-24 10:51:52
================================================================================
/**
 * Enhanced Button Utilities for Properties 4 Creations
 * Provides loading states, ripple effects, and interactive features
 */
class ButtonUtils {
  constructor () {
    this.init();
  }
  init () {
    this.setupRippleEffects();
    this.setupLoadingStates();
    this.setupConfirmationDialogs();
    this.setupCopyToClipboard();
  }
  /**
   * Setup ripple effects for buttons
   */
  setupRippleEffects () {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const button = e.target.closest('.btn');
      if (!button || button.classList.contains('btn-ripple-disabled')) return;
      if (button.disabled || button.classList.contains('loading')) return;
      this.createRipple(button, e);
    });
  }
  /**
   * Create ripple effect
   */
  createRipple (button, event) {
    const ripple = document.createElement('span');
    ripple.className = 'btn-ripple';
    const rect = button.getBoundingClientRect();
    const size = Math.max(rect.width, rect.height);
    const x = event.clientX - rect.left - size / 2;
    const y = event.clientY - rect.top - size / 2;
    ripple.style.width = ripple.style.height = size + 'px';
    ripple.style.left = x + 'px';
    ripple.style.top = y + 'px';
    button.appendChild(ripple);
    setTimeout(() => {
      ripple.remove();
    }, 600);
  }
  /**
   * Set loading state on button
   */
  static setLoading (selector, loadingText = 'Loading...') {
    const button =
      typeof selector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(selector)
        : selector;
    if (!button) return;
    button.classList.add('loading');
    button.disabled = true;
    if (!button.dataset.originalText) {
      button.dataset.originalText = button.innerHTML;
    }
    button.innerHTML = loadingText;
  }
  /**
   * Remove loading state from button
   */
  static removeLoading (selector, newText = null) {
    const button =
      typeof selector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(selector)
        : selector;
    if (!button) return;
    button.classList.remove('loading');
    button.disabled = false;
    if (newText) {
      button.innerHTML = newText;
    } else if (button.dataset.originalText) {
      button.innerHTML = button.dataset.originalText;
      delete button.dataset.originalText;
    }
  }
  /**
   * Setup loading states for forms
   */
  setupLoadingStates () {
    document.addEventListener('submit', (e) => {
      const form = e.target;
      const submitBtn = form.querySelector('button[type="submit"]');
      if (submitBtn && !submitBtn.classList.contains('no-loading')) {
        ButtonUtils.setLoading(submitBtn, 'Submitting...');
      }
    });
  }
  /**
   * Add confirmation dialog to button
   */
  static addConfirmation (selector, message, callback) {
    const button =
      typeof selector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(selector)
        : selector;
    if (!button) return;
    button.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (!confirm(message)) {
        e.preventDefault();
        return false;
      }
      if (callback) {
        callback(e);
      }
    });
  }
  /**
   * Setup confirmation dialogs
   */
  setupConfirmationDialogs () {
    document.querySelectorAll('[data-confirm]').forEach((button) => {
      const message = button.dataset.confirm;
      ButtonUtils.addConfirmation(button, message);
    });
  }
  /**
   * Copy text to clipboard
   */
  static copyToClipboard (text, button = null) {
    navigator.clipboard
      .writeText(text)
      .then(() => {
        if (button) {
          const originalText = button.innerHTML;
          button.innerHTML = '<i data-lucide="check" class="icon"></i> Copied!';
          button.classList.add('btn-success');
          setTimeout(() => {
            button.innerHTML = originalText;
            button.classList.remove('btn-success');
          }, 2000);
        }
      })
      .catch(() => {
      });
  }
  /**
   * Setup copy to clipboard functionality
   */
  setupCopyToClipboard () {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const button = e.target.closest('[data-copy]');
      if (!button) return;
      const text = button.dataset.copy;
      ButtonUtils.copyToClipboard(text, button);
    });
  }
  /**
   * Toggle button group active state
   */
  static toggleButtonGroup (button) {
    const group = button.closest('.btn-group');
    if (!group) return;
    group.querySelectorAll('.btn').forEach((btn) => {
      btn.classList.remove('active');
      btn.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'false');
    });
    button.classList.add('active');
    button.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'true');
  }
  /**
   * Setup button groups
   */
  setupButtonGroups () {
    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      const button = e.target.closest('.btn-group .btn');
      if (!button) return;
      ButtonUtils.toggleButtonGroup(button);
    });
  }
  /**
   * Initialize button groups on page load
   */
  initializeButtonGroups () {
    document.querySelectorAll('.btn-group .active').forEach((button) => {
      button.setAttribute('aria-pressed', 'true');
    });
  }
}
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
  new ButtonUtils();
});
if (typeof module !== 'undefined' && module.exports) {
  module.exports = ButtonUtils;
}

FILE: docs\js\comparison-slider.js
SIZE: 5409 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-24 10:51:52
================================================================================
/**
 * Before/After Comparison Slider Component
 * Interactive slider for showcasing property transformations
 */
class ComparisonSlider {
  constructor(container, options = {}) {
    this.container = container;
    this.options = {
      initialPosition: 50, // Percentage
      sensitivity: 1,
      animationDuration: 300,
      ...options
    };
    this.beforeImage = container.querySelector('.slider-before');
    this.afterImage = container.querySelector('.slider-after');
    this.handle = container.querySelector('.slider-handle');
    this.beforeLabel = container.querySelector('.slider-label.before');
    this.afterLabel = container.querySelector('.slider-label.after');
    this.isDragging = false;
    this.containerWidth = 0;
    this.init();
  }
  init() {
    if (!this.beforeImage || !this.afterImage || !this.handle) {
      return;
    }
    this.setPosition(this.options.initialPosition);
    this.handle.addEventListener('mousedown', this.startDrag.bind(this));
    this.handle.addEventListener('touchstart', this.startDrag.bind(this), { passive: false });
    document.addEventListener('mousemove', this.drag.bind(this));
    document.addEventListener('touchmove', this.drag.bind(this), { passive: false });
    document.addEventListener('mouseup', this.endDrag.bind(this));
    document.addEventListener('touchend', this.endDrag.bind(this));
    this.handle.addEventListener('keydown', this.handleKeydown.bind(this));
    window.addEventListener('resize', this.handleResize.bind(this));
    this.handle.setAttribute('role', 'slider');
    this.handle.setAttribute('aria-valuemin', '0');
    this.handle.setAttribute('aria-valuemax', '100');
    this.handle.setAttribute('aria-valuenow', this.options.initialPosition);
    this.handle.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Adjust comparison slider');
    this.handle.setAttribute('tabindex', '0');
    this.addLabels();
  }
  addLabels() {
    if (!this.beforeLabel) {
      const beforeLabel = document.createElement('div');
      beforeLabel.className = 'slider-label before';
      beforeLabel.textContent = 'Before';
      this.container.appendChild(beforeLabel);
      this.beforeLabel = beforeLabel;
    }
    if (!this.afterLabel) {
      const afterLabel = document.createElement('div');
      afterLabel.className = 'slider-label after';
      afterLabel.textContent = 'After';
      this.container.appendChild(afterLabel);
      this.afterLabel = afterLabel;
    }
  }
  startDrag(e) {
    e.preventDefault();
    this.isDragging = true;
    this.container.classList.add('dragging');
    this.handle.focus();
  }
  drag(e) {
    if (!this.isDragging) return;
    const clientX = e.clientX || e.touches[0].clientX;
    const rect = this.container.getBoundingClientRect();
    const x = clientX - rect.left;
    const percentage = (x / rect.width) * 100;
    this.setPosition(Math.max(0, Math.min(100, percentage)));
  }
  endDrag() {
    if (!this.isDragging) return;
    this.isDragging = false;
    this.container.classList.remove('dragging');
  }
  setPosition(percentage) {
    this.options.initialPosition = percentage;
    this.beforeImage.style.clipPath = `inset(0 ${100 - percentage}% 0 0)`;
    this.handle.style.left = `${percentage}%`;
    this.handle.setAttribute('aria-valuenow', Math.round(percentage));
    if (this.beforeLabel) {
      this.beforeLabel.style.left = `${Math.max(10, percentage - 25)}px`;
    }
    if (this.afterLabel) {
      this.afterLabel.style.right = `${Math.max(10, 100 - percentage - 25)}px`;
    }
  }
  handleKeydown(e) {
    const step = 1;
    switch (e.key) {
      case 'ArrowLeft':
      case 'ArrowDown':
        e.preventDefault();
        this.setPosition(this.options.initialPosition - step);
        break;
      case 'ArrowRight':
      case 'ArrowUp':
        e.preventDefault();
        this.setPosition(this.options.initialPosition + step);
        break;
      case 'Home':
        e.preventDefault();
        this.setPosition(0);
        break;
      case 'End':
        e.preventDefault();
        this.setPosition(100);
        break;
    }
  }
  handleResize() {
    this.setPosition(this.options.initialPosition);
  }
  reset() {
    this.setPosition(50);
  }
  setBeforeImage(src, alt) {
    this.beforeImage.src = src;
    this.beforeImage.alt = alt;
  }
  setAfterImage(src, alt) {
    this.afterImage.src = src;
    this.afterImage.alt = alt;
  }
  destroy() {
    document.removeEventListener('mousemove', this.drag.bind(this));
    document.removeEventListener('touchmove', this.drag.bind(this));
    document.removeEventListener('mouseup', this.endDrag.bind(this));
    document.removeEventListener('touchend', this.endDrag.bind(this));
    window.removeEventListener('resize', this.handleResize.bind(this));
  }
}
function initComparisonSliders() {
  const sliders = document.querySelectorAll('.comparison-slider .slider-container');
  sliders.forEach(container => {
    new ComparisonSlider(container, {
      initialPosition: 50,
      sensitivity: 1
    });
  });
}
window.ComparisonSlider = ComparisonSlider;
window.initComparisonSliders = initComparisonSliders;
if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initComparisonSliders);
} else {
  initComparisonSliders();
}

FILE: docs\js\components\Accordion.js
SIZE: 9264 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-24 10:51:52
================================================================================
/**
 * Accordion - Accessible Accordion Component
 * Properties 4 Creations
 *
 * Features:
 * - ARIA expanded states
 * - Keyboard navigation (Enter/Space to toggle, Arrow keys)
 * - Single or multiple panels open
 * - Smooth height animations
 * - Screen reader announcements
 */
export class Accordion {
  constructor (containerSelector, options = {}) {
    this.container =
      typeof containerSelector === 'string'
        ? document.querySelector(containerSelector)
        : containerSelector;
    this.options = {
      allowMultiple: false,
      defaultOpen: [], // Array of indices to open by default
      animationDuration: 300,
      onToggle: null,
      ...options
    };
    this.items = [];
    this.init();
  }
  /**
   * Initialize the accordion
   */
  init () {
    if (!this.container) {
      return;
    }
    const accordionItems = this.container.querySelectorAll(
      '.accordion__item, .faq-item'
    );
    accordionItems.forEach((item, index) => {
      const button = item.querySelector(
        '.accordion__button, .accordion__header, .faq-question'
      );
      const panel = item.querySelector(
        '.accordion__panel, .accordion__content, .faq-answer'
      );
      if (!button || !panel) return;
      const buttonId = button.id || `accordion-button-${index}`;
      const panelId = panel.id || `accordion-panel-${index}`;
      button.id = buttonId;
      panel.id = panelId;
      button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
      button.setAttribute('aria-controls', panelId);
      button.setAttribute('role', 'button');
      button.setAttribute('tabindex', '0');
      panel.setAttribute('aria-labelledby', buttonId);
      panel.setAttribute('role', 'region');
      panel.hidden = true;
      if (!button.querySelector('.accordion__icon')) {
        const icon = document.createElement('span');
        icon.className = 'accordion__icon';
        icon.setAttribute('aria-hidden', 'true');
        icon.innerHTML = `
          <svg width='20' height='20' viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'>
            <polyline points='6 9 12 15 18 9'/>
          </svg>
        `;
        button.appendChild(icon);
      }
      button.addEventListener('click', () => this.toggle(index));
      button.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => this.handleKeydown(e, index));
      this.items.push({ item, button, panel, isOpen: false });
    });
    this.options.defaultOpen.forEach((index) => {
      if (index >= 0 && index < this.items.length) {
        this.open(index, false);
      }
    });
  }
  /**
   * Toggle an accordion panel
   * @param {number} index - Panel index
   */
  toggle (index) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.items.length) return;
    const { isOpen } = this.items[index];
    if (isOpen) {
      this.close(index);
    } else {
      this.open(index);
    }
  }
  /**
   * Open an accordion panel
   * @param {number} index - Panel index
   * @param {boolean} animate - Whether to animate
   */
  open (index, animate = true) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.items.length) return;
    const { button, panel, isOpen } = this.items[index];
    if (isOpen) return;
    if (!this.options.allowMultiple) {
      this.items.forEach((item, i) => {
        if (i !== index && item.isOpen) {
          this.close(i, animate);
        }
      });
    }
    this.items[index].isOpen = true;
    button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'true');
    button.classList.add('accordion__button--active');
    panel.hidden = false;
    if (animate) {
      this.animateOpen(panel);
    } else {
      panel.style.maxHeight = 'none';
      panel.classList.add('accordion__panel--active');
    }
    if (typeof this.options.onToggle === 'function') {
      this.options.onToggle(index, true);
    }
  }
  /**
   * Close an accordion panel
   * @param {number} index - Panel index
   * @param {boolean} animate - Whether to animate
   */
  close (index, animate = true) {
    if (index < 0 || index >= this.items.length) return;
    const { button, panel, isOpen } = this.items[index];
    if (!isOpen) return;
    this.items[index].isOpen = false;
    button.setAttribute('aria-expanded', 'false');
    button.classList.remove('accordion__button--active');
    if (animate) {
      this.animateClose(panel);
    } else {
      panel.hidden = true;
      panel.style.maxHeight = '';
      panel.classList.remove('accordion__panel--active');
    }
    if (typeof this.options.onToggle === 'function') {
      this.options.onToggle(index, false);
    }
  }
  /**
   * Animate panel opening
   * @param {HTMLElement} panel - Panel element
   */
  animateOpen (panel) {
    panel.style.maxHeight = 'none';
    const height = panel.scrollHeight;
    panel.style.maxHeight = '0px';
    panel.offsetHeight;
    panel.style.transition = `max-height ${this.options.animationDuration}ms ease-out`;
    panel.style.maxHeight = `${height}px`;
    panel.classList.add('accordion__panel--active');
    setTimeout(() => {
      panel.style.maxHeight = 'none';
      panel.style.transition = '';
    }, this.options.animationDuration);
  }
  /**
   * Animate panel closing
   * @param {HTMLElement} panel - Panel element
   */
  animateClose (panel) {
    const height = panel.scrollHeight;
    panel.style.maxHeight = `${height}px`;
    panel.offsetHeight;
    panel.style.transition = `max-height ${this.options.animationDuration}ms ease-out`;
    panel.style.maxHeight = '0px';
    panel.classList.remove('accordion__panel--active');
    setTimeout(() => {
      panel.hidden = true;
      panel.style.maxHeight = '';
      panel.style.transition = '';
    }, this.options.animationDuration);
  }
  /**
   * Handle keyboard navigation
   * @param {KeyboardEvent} e - Keyboard event
   * @param {number} index - Current panel index
   */
  handleKeydown (e, index) {
    const { key } = e;
    switch (key) {
    case 'Enter':
    case ' ':
      e.preventDefault();
      this.toggle(index);
      break;
    case 'ArrowDown':
      e.preventDefault();
      this.focusNext(index);
      break;
    case 'ArrowUp':
      e.preventDefault();
      this.focusPrevious(index);
      break;
    case 'Home':
      e.preventDefault();
      this.focusFirst();
      break;
    case 'End':
      e.preventDefault();
      this.focusLast();
      break;
    }
  }
  /**
   * Focus next accordion button
   * @param {number} currentIndex - Current index
   */
  focusNext (currentIndex) {
    const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % this.items.length;
    this.items[nextIndex].button.focus();
  }
  /**
   * Focus previous accordion button
   * @param {number} currentIndex - Current index
   */
  focusPrevious (currentIndex) {
    const prevIndex =
      currentIndex === 0 ? this.items.length - 1 : currentIndex - 1;
    this.items[prevIndex].button.focus();
  }
  /**
   * Focus first accordion button
   */
  focusFirst () {
    if (this.items.length > 0) {
      this.items[0].button.focus();
    }
  }
  /**
   * Focus last accordion button
   */
  focusLast () {
    if (this.items.length > 0) {
      this.items[this.items.length - 1].button.focus();
    }
  }
  /**
   * Open all panels
   */
  openAll () {
    this.items.forEach((_, index) => this.open(index));
  }
  /**
   * Close all panels
   */
  closeAll () {
    this.items.forEach((_, index) => this.close(index));
  }
  /**
   * Get open panel indices
   * @returns {number[]} Array of open panel indices
   */
  getOpenPanels () {
    return this.items
      .map((item, index) => (item.isOpen ? index : -1))
      .filter((index) => index !== -1);
  }
  /**
   * Check if a panel is open
   * @param {number} index - Panel index
   * @returns {boolean} True if panel is open
   */
  isPanelOpen (index) {
    return this.items[index]?.isOpen || false;
  }
  /**
   * Destroy the accordion and clean up
   */
  destroy () {
    this.items.forEach(({ button, panel }) => {
      button.removeAttribute('aria-expanded');
      button.removeAttribute('aria-controls');
      button.removeAttribute('role');
      button.removeAttribute('tabindex');
      button.classList.remove('accordion__button--active');
      panel.removeAttribute('aria-labelledby');
      panel.removeAttribute('role');
      panel.hidden = false;
      panel.style.maxHeight = '';
      panel.classList.remove('accordion__panel--active');
    });
    this.items = [];
  }
}
/**
 * Initialize all accordions on the page
 * @param {string} selector - Accordion container selector
 * @param {Object} options - Accordion options
 * @returns {Accordion[]} Array of accordion instances
 */
export function initAccordions (selector = '.accordion', options = {}) {
  const containers = document.querySelectorAll(selector);
  return Array.from(containers).map(
    (container) => new Accordion(container, options)
  );
}
if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
  window.Accordion = Accordion;
  window.initAccordions = initAccordions;
}
export default Accordion;

FILE: docs\js\components\Modal.js
SIZE: 9387 bytes
MODIFIED: 2025-12-24 10:51:52
